Du blir en del av ett dedikerat företag som varje dag arbetar för ett säkrare Sverige. Här är varje arbetsdag meningsfull, och ditt arbete kan vara skillnaden som räddar liv. Vill du vara med?
 



  





**Om tjänsten som Gruppchef** 




 I rollen som Gruppchef för Team Telefoni har du det övergripande ansvaret för att leda en nystartad gruppering som hanterar driften av våra samhällskritiska telefoniplattformar. Rollen är både operativ och strategisk med ett tydligt uttalat mål att utveckla våra förmågor och samarbeten med andra aktörer över tid. En stor del av gruppens arbete kretsar kring uppgraderingar, utveckling av funktioner, plattformsförvaltning kring Linuxplattformar samt incident- och problemhantering. Du kommer att vara en nyckelperson som leder och skapar förutsättningar för våra medarbetare i deras dagliga arbete för att säkerställa en stabil, robust, säker och effektiv infrastruktur kopplat till våra mest kritiska komponenter. Med en grupp om initialt 5 medarbetare som du har personalansvar för kommer du inte bara att vara ansvarig för viktiga delar av vår leverans, utan även att ha en central roll i IT-driftens ledningsgrupp. Fler telefoninära funktioner så som Rakel kommer över tid också omlokaliseras till denna gruppering.
 



  





**Din vardag som Gruppchef** 




 I rollen som Gruppchef för Telefoni är din huvudsakliga uppgift att säkerställa kvaliteten i vår tekniska leverans samt att hantera och stödja gruppen i deras dagliga arbete. Gruppen sitter idag utspritt över stora delar av landet vilket kräver en ledare som är bekväm med att leda team som samarbetar digitalt. Vidare kommer du att representera gruppen och samarbeta med både interna och externa parter för att säkerställa att våra samhällsviktiga system och tjänster lever upp till ytterst högt ställda krav. Detta kan i praktiken betyda allt från detaljerade tekniska diskussioner till att delta i strategiska diskussioner och initiativ för att vidareutveckla IT-driften på SOS Alarm.
 



  





**Vi erbjuder dig** 




 En arbetsplats i en spännande utvecklingsfas med ett tydligt innovativt fokus. SOS Alarm präglas av ett starkt medarbetarengagemang och har som vision att vara navet som skapar trygghet och säkerhet. Hos oss är våra värderingar,
 **Professionella & Empatiska** 
 samt
 **Ansvarstagande & Samverkande** 
 , något som genomsyrar hela kulturen på SOS Alarm, att du kan relatera till dessa är en förutsättning för att trivas hos oss!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som** 



* Är en rak och tydlig kommunikatör som säkerställer att vi undviker missförstånd, internt såväl som i externa dialoger.
* Uppskattar att både kunna arbeta strategiskt med flerårsplaner samt att kunna växla till mer operativa frågor.
* Är en trygg person som kan stå upp för de värderingar vi står för.
* Är kvalitetsmedveten, noggrann och strukturerad - vilket betyder att du trivs och stimuleras av de höga krav som ställs på gruppens uppdrag samt är bekväm i en roll som kräver att hantering av fel sker resolut och omedelbart.
* Är van vid att leda och coacha personal från tidigare chefsroller.
* Har en grundläggande teknisk förståelse och förmågan att hantera och förstå olika tekniska utmaningar och processer.



  





**Låter detta intressant?** 
 Skicka in din ansökan snarast, dock senast
 *den 20:e november 2025.* 
 Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail.
 



  





**Har du frågor?** 
 Kontakta Christian Johansson
 *, Chef IT-drift, christian.johansson@sosalarm.se* 




  





*SOS Alarm genomför bakgrundskontroll och säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll på sin personal enligt kraven ur säkerhetsskyddslag (2018:585). Även en kontroll enligt Lag (1974:191) om bevakningsföretag utförs och är aktiv under anställningsperioden. Drogtest utan anmärkning är en förutsättning för anställning. Tjänsten innebär även krigsplacering vid SOS Alarm.*

title: Master Thesis: Dynamic multi-agent architectures for progressive expert-level upskilling
description:
**Join our Team**
**About Us**
 We are exploring the future of artificial intelligence assistants, moving beyond single large language models toward collaborative multi-agent systems. Our research focuses on dynamic orchestration, hierarchical coordination, and evolving architectures that enable assistants to perform tasks, learn, and reorganize themselves in real time. We are particularly focused on enterprise applications, where AI must acquire expert-level skills from humans through natural interactions such as voice, chat, and visual feedback. Our goal is to identify the most effective multi-agent designs for supporting this ongoing upskilling process and shaping the next generation of intelligent enterprise solutions.
   

  

 We are looking for 1 or 2 students for this position based in either Stockholm or Lund, if you have a classmate you would like to write this thesis with please provide their name in your application.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Conduct a structured review of state-of-the-art multi-agent frameworks (e.g., HiVA, DyLAN, MetaGPT, MASAI, Multi-Agent Debate).
* Classify their strategies for agent orchestration and skill acquisition.
* Implement representative prototypes of at least two approaches (for example, hierarchical workflows vs. dynamically evolving topologies).
* Test prototypes on benchmark tasks such as reasoning, coding, and multi-step QA.
* Evaluate adaptability, efficiency, autonomy, explainability, and human intervention requirements.
* Present results and discuss implications for building enterprise-grade AI assistant.


**The skills you will bring:**
* Background in computer science, computer engineering, AI, or related fields.
* Knowledge of machine learning or multi-agent systems.
* Familiarity with large language models.
* Strong Python programming skills.
* Experience with modern AI frameworks such as Autogen/AG2, LangChain, or Hugging Face.


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:** 
 773591

title: Senior Director Logistics Nordics
description:
**Job Purpose:**
 To direct the Logistics Operation to ensure service and financial performance targets are consistently met in providing service to the business entities.
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Directs country warehousing operations to meet the company’s business objectives:
+ Delivers against agreed SLA’s.
+ Ensures alignment, coordination and cooperation with respective sales country/region on logistics and reverse logistics.
+ Handles transportation carriers (ie SLA’s, cost and service).
+ Prioritises activities/resources within the Logistics Centre.
+ Leverages synergies and continuously drives best practice.
+ Drives European and Global logistics initiatives into the LC.
+ Drives continuous improvement process.

* Manages performance, evaluates and develops the Logistics team.
* Manages the Logistics Centre ensuring compliance to SOX, compliance and security procedures.
* Delivers on financial budget commitments (i.e. AOP, Capital Plan) for the Logistics Centre.
* Develops and delivers on operational AOP plan for key functional areas (i.e. freight, inventory control).
* Develops a relationship with Vendors, customers and carriers.
* Acts as a fully integrated member of the wider business team supporting the development of business strategy and ensuring Logistics alignment with that strategy.
* Develops and implements communication channels with all levels of the operations team, ensuring effective communication of business and departmental objectives and performance of the team.
* Develops and implements proactive customer solutions that support the business in differentiating TD SYNNEX from our competitors


**Knowledge Skills and Experience:**
* Strong knowledge of logistics and / or Warehouse Integrated systems and Warehouse design
* Ability to ensure logistics center successfully supports the business objective
* Results orientated
* Ability to work in fast paced constantly changing environment take quick decisive actions
* Broad Supply chain experience
* Strong leadership skills
* Customer focussed
* Process driven
* Able to build solid, effective working relationships with others


**Key Skills**
 Business Objectives, Financial Performance, Leadership, Logistics Operations, Performance Measurement, Security, Warehousing Operations
   

  

 At TD SYNNEX, our values guide everything we do: Together, We Own It, We Dare to Go, We Grow and Win, and above all, We Do the Right Thing. These principles shape how we work with each other, our partners, and our communities as we drive innovation and create lasting impact.
   

  

**What’s In It For You?**
* Elective Benefits: Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
* Grow Your Career: Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
* Elevate Your Personal Well-Being: Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
* Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: It’s not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
* Make the Most of our Global Organization: Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
* Connect with Your Community: Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.


**Don’t meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.**
 At TD SYNNEX, we’re proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you’re excited about working for our company and believe you’re a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we’re looking for!

title: Thesis opportunity! Real-time credit decisioning: ML models for live underwriting
description:
In a perfect world there would be no credit. All credit is bad by nature and you do well in avoiding it as much as you can. In a perfect world, they and the companies that provide them wouldn't exist. We wouldn't either. But we don't live in a perfect world. From time to time, we all need a helping hand to make ends meet and to make dreams become a reality.
 



 From time to time, we all need a life-happens credit buffer.
 



 Just make sure it's a fair one.
 



  





**Who are we?** 




 Fairlo is a fintech company active in Sweden and in the UK with the ambition to help people get access to sustainable finances. Our competitive edge comes from our mission for transparency and flexibility towards the client as well as our inhouse built credit decision engine.
 



  





**What would I work on?** 




 We are now offering an opportunity to write your degree thesis with us during the spring semester of 2026. The thesis will be conducted together with the Credit Risk department but will likely span across the entire organization.
 



  





 You would be in charge of developing new credit risk models to further improve the prediction of credit defaults. We have a lot of fun machine learning projects on this topic and you would become a key player in the development of the project.
 



  





**Language:** 
 English
 



**Office location:** 
 Stockholm
 



**Deadline for application:** 
 2025-12-14

title: Interim Projektledare ERP
description:
Vi söker en erfaren projektledare/konsult för att leda implementeringen av Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central hos vår kund som är en internationell koncern med flera dotterbolag. Uppdraget omfattar planering, genomförande och uppföljning av projektet samt samordning mellan IT, Finance och verksamheten. Uppdraget startar under januari och beräknas pågå i 12 månader med placering på kundens kontor i centrala Stockholm.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Leda implementering av Business Central inom flera bolag
* Säkerställa lokala anpassningar och legala krav
* Planera, följa upp och rapportera projektets framdrift
* Leda workshops och projektmöten
* Delta operativt vid behov (testning, konfiguration, dokumentation)



  





**Krav:** 



* Minst två genomförda Business Central-implementeringar, gärna i koncernmiljö
* God förståelse för Business Central-funktioner inom ekonomi, rapportering och appar

**Ansökan:** 




 Anmäl intresse genom att söka uppdraget eller kontakta Erik Eklund om du har frågor, erik.eklund@braincompetence.se.

title: Senior Utvecklare till Stabelo!
description:
*Vill du vara en del i att bygga nästa generations digitala bolåneplattform? Trivs du när du får kombinera hands-on utveckling med coachande ledarskap och tekniska vägval i en modern cloud miljö? Sök då rollen som Senior Utvecklare till Stabelo!*
**Din vardag**
 Som Senior Utvecklare hos Stabelo arbetar du nära produkt och affär i ett litet, snabbt team där dina beslut märks direkt. Du utvecklar över hela stacken med JavaScript/TypeScript och React i frontend samt Go och Python i backend, ovanpå AWS och PostgreSQL. Arkitekturen är mikroservicebaserad och ni verkar i en CI/CD miljö där test, observability och kodkvalitet är en naturlig del av flödet.
   

  

 Ni arbetar i två-veckors sprintar och genomför Scrum ceremonier (planering, daily, review, retro), samtidigt som ni använder Kanban för att hålla ett jämnt och smidigt arbetsflöde i teamet och mellan olika delar av organisationen.
   

  

 Som Senior Utvecklare förväntas du höja teamets produktivitet genom goda utvecklingspraktiker, coachning och aktivt stöd—du driver code reviews, delar med dig av beprövade arbetssätt och sätter en riktning som andra kan följa.
   

  

 Framåt driver ni en radikal utvidgning och optimering av produkterbjudandet, till exempel vidareutveckling av DWH, användarbaserade kalkylatorer som hjälper kunder att förstå bolån bättre, breddning mot exempelvis fritidshus och tilläggslån, samt förbättrade integrationer mot distributörer. Nu finns förutsättningarna på plats för att skala och förfina plattformen.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 För att trivas i rollen som Senior Utvecklare tror vi att du har:
   

  

* Runt 5 års erfarenhet utav fullstackutveckling
* Mycket goda kunskaper i JavaScript/TypeScript och React
* Vana av backend i Go och/eller Python
* Erfarenhet av AWS, infrastruktur och PostgreSQL
* Förståelse för mikroservices arkitektur


 Vi blir extra intresserade av din ansökan om du har efarenhet från fintech/finans.
   

  

 Du är en senior fullstackutvecklare som gillar när ansvar, teknik och affär möts. Du kan växla mellan hands on kod och att vägleda andra, och du har intresse för infrastruktur och databaser utöver ”klassisk” front och backend.
   

  

 Som person är du noggrann och samvetsgrann men också kreativ när situationen kräver det. Vi ser gärna att du tar med dig en tydlig spets – oavsett om den ligger i säkerhet, infrastruktur, avancerade algoritmer, backend design eller modern frontend.
   

  

**Kontakt**
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Stabelo med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult Gustaf Linder på gustaf.linder@wise.se
   

  

 Vi kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter. Vi hanterar alla ansökningar löpande och även så urvalet av kandidater som går vidare till intervju. Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Om oss**
 Hos oss på Stabelo får du chansen att göra skillnad – på riktigt. Vi är ett techdrivet bolåneinstitut som utmanar storbankerna och erbjuder schyssta, enkla och prisvärda bolån utan krångel eller dolda avgifter. Våra bolån distribueras via Avanza och Nordnet, några av Sveriges ledande digitala plattformar för sparande och investeringar.

title: Compensation & Benefits Specialist
description:
**Location:** 
 Helsinki or Stockholm
   

  

**Country:** 
 Finland or Sweden
   

  

**Application due date:** 
 2025-11-20 23:59:59 UTC
   

  

 We are seeking a Compensation & Benefits Specialist to strengthen our Group Compensation & Benefits HR Team.
   

  

 Do you want to contribute to shaping SSAB’s future and help us transform the global steel industry? Our future is nothing without our people. We are building the company of the future and want to be the first in the world to produce fossil-free steel, and our plans are well under way. The position may be based preferably in Stockholm or Helsinki, any other SSAB site location may be considered.
   

  

 Becoming part of the SSAB family means joining a journey. A journey that we believe is essential for the sustainability of this planet. Steel has been one of the most important materials for developing our society and it will continue to be so. In the roofs over our heads, in the bridges connecting our cities and in the cars of tomorrow. At SSAB we are proud of our history and leadership in high-strength steel. But we are also aware that the production of steel is one of the largest emitters of greenhouse gases in the world. That has to change. That is why we have developed the world’s ﬁrst fossil free steel production and has committed to becoming largely fossil-free. As part of SSAB you will be instrumental in realizing this goal and push for the green transformation of the whole steel industry.
   

  

**About The Position**
 We are looking for you who want to develop knowledge and experience in HR Compensation & Benefit matters. The scope of the role is to drive our variable pay program processes as well as hands-on support to the HR team in Compensation & Benefit tasks including base pay, pension, benefits, compliance, mobility. You will report to Head of Compensation & Benefits based in Stockholm and also work closely with several functions including the HR and Finance community at SSAB.
   

  

 The role provides an opportunity for someone who have good financial understanding and is skilled in excel and analytics, and at the same time is keen to work closer with people/HR related matters. You will have own areas of responsibility with great opportunity to influence and improve ways of working in the area impacting company financial considerations and people drivers.
   

  

 The position is temporary until July 2027.
   

  

**Main Responsibilities**
* Manage variable pay program processes including short- and long-term incentives as well as profit sharing.
* Be the point of contact and drive improvements when it comes to program administration. This include both internal process and system improvements as well as external vendor collaborations.
* Support HR in employee contract administration (executive level) including information about variable pay programs.
* Support group HR team in various C&B matters.
* Work close with the rest of the C&B team, also include reviews according to “four-eyes-principle”, compliance and governance matters.
* Active participation in the development of new global HR system for the company. The work include review of concept and processes, testing, requirement on reports and analytics.


**About You
   

  

 We believe that you are interested to learn and adapt previous experience to new areas of responsibilities, have the ability to manage processes with some support and are motivated when you get to take own initiatives. You have an analytical mindset and you’re comfortable working with numbers. You have good communication skills and can build trust and support the organization in a professional and confidential way. Naturally, you have high integrity, and you pay attention to details.**
* You have relevant work experience from working with finance and/or HR with a strong business and financial mindset.
* You are keen to expand your knowledge working in the field between Finance and HR and also a legal compliance mindset.
* Degree in Human Resources, Business, Finance, or other related areas or equivalent preferred.
* Excellent written and oral language skills in English. Swedish and/or Finnish is required.


**Our offer**
 At SSAB we strive for a diverse and inclusive environment. We use our values – driven, true and ahead – in making everyday decisions, keeping the customer at the heart of what we do. This makes us all team players, each with the drive to improve. When joining SSAB you will become part of an organization of passionate problem solvers working together on important challenges. We will support your growth by providing a safe and friendly workplace that contributes to work-life balance. If you set out to achieve it, at SSAB you will have the possibility of broadening your skills and grow within your field or beyond.
   

  

 We offer a wide range of appreciated benefits to our employees. Some examples of these are listed here:
   

  

* Profit sharing
* Life balance through reduction of working hours
* Wellness grants


**Recruitment process**
 1. Apply
   

  

 2. Interview
   

  

 3. Assessments
   

  

 4. Reference Check
   

  

 5. Come and meet us
   

  

 6. Health Examination
   

  

 7. Sign
   

  

 Background check may be a part of the recruitment process.
   

  

**Got questions about this position?**
 Please contact Susanne Lundquist, Manager Comp & Ben, phone +46 70 225 2931
   

  

 We decline contacts from recruitment agencies and ad sellers regarding this advertisement.
   

  

 Trade union information is provided by Akademikerföreningen, Unionen and Ledarna, which can be reached via our switchboard on phone +46 155 254 000 (regarding Sweden).
   

  

**Words from your future manager**
 "I am Susanne Lundqvist and I will be your future manager and supporter at SSAB. You will have own areas of responsibility with great opportunity to drive ways of working in the area impacting company financial considerations and people drivers. I will be here together with the Team to guide and coach you."
   

  

**Join us at SSAB**

title: Art Director
description:
**About us** 




 Steamery’s vision is to be the global leader within clothing care by giving people the very best tools to love and care for their clothes. We are present in 60 markets worldwide, and our team at the Stockholm office currently consists of 32 passionate individuals.
 



 Learn more at www.steamery.se
 



  





**The role** 




 We are now seeking to add a hands-on Art Director to our team with a minimum of 5 years of experience.
 



  





 You’ve worked at an agency or lifestyle brand and love concepting ideas just as much as bringing them to life. You are able to take brand identity and understand how to implement it into all touch points. You have the ability to see the brand as a whole and ensure consistent executions across all channels. This is your chance to help drive a new level of creativity, bring our brand to the next level, and elevate our consumer touchpoints across every channel.
 



  





**Your main responsibilities will include (but are not limited to):** 



* Concept, design, and execute creative ideas across all consumer touchpoints with a focus on campaigns, digital ads, and social content
* Translate commercial goals and the commercial calendar into compelling creative solutions
* Work hands-on with design, motion graphics, and digital production
* Work in our small but mighty in-house team on productions to bring to life creative solutions even with limited resources.



  





**What we’re looking for** 



* Strong conceptual thinker with an eye for aesthetics and storytelling
* Experience driving creative ideation through production with and without big production teams
* Interest/experience in physical creative experiences (eg, popups, experiential advertising, etc)
* Hands-on skills and interest across all mediums, especially digital and motion
* Ability to create and ensure consistent brand touch points across all channels



  





**Must-have hard-skills** 



* Motion graphics & animation
* Image retouching
* Adobe Creative Suite
* Figma
* Creative concept development
* (Bonus) Comfortable using AI tools for creative execution



  





**Who you are** 



* A proactive, collaborative team player
* Comfortable with deadlines and time management
* Curious about trends, brands, and creative innovation – always looking around for inspiration
* Always eager to learn and grow your skills — we support professional development with personal education benefits
* English as a working language



  





 Located in Stockholm: we have a policy of 3 days a week in the office to contribute to collaboration.
 



 To apply: Please submit your CV, a short cover letter and your portfolio specifying your role in each project and team constellation by 2025-11-21 - applications may close early.
 



  




* This is a permanent position based in Stockholm. We will be interviewing candidates on an ongoing basis and will fill the position as soon as we find the right person – so don’t wait to apply!

title: Postdoc in Transport Policy Analysis
description:
**Job Description**
 Urban mobility is changing rapidly due to new business models, and upcoming technological advancements like connected and automated mobility.
   

  

 The Division of Transport and Systems Analysis at KTH is seeking a highly qualified candidate for a postdoctoral research position in Transportation Policy. The successful candidate will conduct research on policies related to on-demand responsive mobility, with the overarching goals of reducing transport inequalities, enhancing accessibility, and improving social welfare. The postdoc will employ methodologies such as activity-based agent-based modeling, social welfare theory, and distributional analysis. Case studies will be developed in collaboration with local transport agencies and mobility providers.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**Requirements**
* A doctoral degree or an equivalent foreign degree. This eligibility requirement must be met no later than the time the employment decision is made.
* Proven experience with the activity-based agent-based model MATSim
* Publications in transportation research journals
* Ability to fluently communicate in English (written and oral), will be required in the day-to-day work.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team


**Preferred Qualifications**
* A doctoral degree or an equivalent foreign degree, obtained within the last three years prior to the application deadline
* Knowledge of programming tools (e.g., JAVA, C++, Python)
* Familiarity with travel demand modeling and accessibility analysis
* Awareness of diversity and equal opportunity issues, with specific focus on gender equality


 Great emphasis will be placed on personal skills.
   

  

 Join us at KTH
   

  

 KTH shapes the future through education, research and innovation. As a leading international technical university, we play an active role in advancing the transition towards a sustainable society. At KTH, you have the opportunity to grow and develop in a creative and dynamic environment, with good working conditions and attractive benefits. Equality, diversity and equal opportunities are essential to quality and form an integral part of KTH’s core values as a university and public authority.
   

  

 Learn more about our benefits and what it's like to work and grow at KTH.
   

  

 Trade union representatives
   

  

 Contact information to trade union representatives.
   

  

 To apply for the position
   

  

 Log into KTH's recruitment system to apply for this position. You are responsible for ensuring that your application is complete according to the instructions in the ad.
   

  

**Instructions:**
* CV including relevant professional experience and knowledge.
* Copy of diplomas and grades from your previous university studies. Translations into English or Swedish if the original documents have not been issued in any of these languages.
* Cover letter (max two pages long) with a brief description of your research background and relevant interests
* Representative publications or technical reports: For longer documents, please provide a summary (abstract) and a web link to the full text


 Your complete application must be received at KTH no later than the last day of application, midnight CET/CEST (Central European Time/Central European Summer Time).
   

  

**About The Employment**
 The position offered is for, at the most, two years.
   

  

 A position as a postdoctoral fellow is a time-limited qualified appointment focusing mainly on research, intended as a first career step after a dissertation.
   

  

 Others
   

  

 For information about processing of personal data in the recruitment process.
   

  

 It may be the case that a position at KTH is classified as a security-sensitive role in accordance with the Protective Security Act (2018:585). If this applies to the specific position, a security clearance will be conducted for the applicant in accordance with the same law with the applicant's consent. In such cases, a prerequisite for employment is that the applicant is approved following the security clearance.
   

  

 We firmly decline all contact with staffing and recruitment agencies and job ad salespersons.
   

  

 Disclaimer: In case of discrepancy between the Swedish original and the English translation of the job announcement, the Swedish version takes precedence.

title: Upphandlare till Fastighetskontoret, Stockholms stad
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.
   

  

 Fastighetskontoret förvaltar och utvecklar ett unikt fastighetsbestånd viktigt för Stockholms invånare, företagare och besökare. Fastighetsbeståndet består av allt från välkända Stockholmsbyggnader till offentliga lokaler för kultur och idrott, kontorsbyggnader, brandstationer, saluhallar, slott, gårdar och torp. Vi förvaltar även natur- och friluftsområden utanför stadsgränsen. Vi sitter i Tekniska Nämndhuset på Fleminggatan 4, cirka 5 minuters promenad från Centralstationen.
   

  

**Välkommen till oss**
 Är du en erfaren upphandlare som vill vara med och forma morgondagens Stockholm? Nu söker vi en upphandlare som vill arbeta med tjänsteupphandlingar kopplade till byggprojekt. Hos oss får du en viktig roll i ett kompetent team där vi tillsammans driver utveckling, skapar affärsnytta och bidrar till stadens hållbara tillväxt. Du blir en del av en av Sveriges största upphandlande organisationer med ett välutvecklat nätverk inom offentlig upphandling.
   

  

**En personlig hälsning från Jenny Börselius, enhetschef för upphandling**
 Jag har världens bästa arbetsplats där vi samverkar, driver och utvecklar stadens fastigheter för stockholmarna. Med mig som chef får du en lyhörd, stödjande och inspirerande ledare. Jag hoppas att du vill bli en del av vårt fantastiska team!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
 Hos oss blir du en del av ett engagerat upphandlingsteam med 8 medarbetare där vi stöttar varandra, delar kunskap och har roligt på jobbet. Vi arbetar med stort ansvar och stolthet för vårt uppdrag.
   

  

 Du får:
   

  

* Flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet till distansarbete
* Generösa friskvårdsförmåner
* Lunchförmån
* Möjlighet att växla semesterdagstillägg mot extra ledighet
* En varierad arbetsvardag med stora möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling.


**Din roll**
 I rollen ansvarar du för upphandlingar av tjänster och stödfunktioner som städtjänster, IT, ekonomisystem och andra verksamhetsstöd som behövs för bygg- och projektverksamheten. Du arbetar från behovsanalys till avtal och uppföljning, i nära samarbete med beställare i verksamheten och andra stödfunktioner.
   

  

 Du säkerställer att upphandlingarna genomförs i enlighet med LOU och stadens riktlinjer, med affärsmässighet, kvalitet och hållbarhet i fokus. Du stöttar verksamheten i att utforma kravställningar, utvärderingsmodeller och avtal, samt bidrar med din kompetens vid juridiska och avtalsmässiga frågeställningar. I arbetet ingår även att utveckla och förbättra enhetens arbetssätt, rutiner och mallar för att skapa effektiva och rättssäkra inköpsprocesser.
   

  

**Din kompetens och erfarenhet**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* relevant högskole-/universitetsutbildning inom juridik, teknik, ekonomi eller YH-utbildning inom upphandling alternativt erfarenhet som vi sammantaget bedömer som motsvarande
* flerårig dokumenterad erfarenhet av offentlig upphandling, gärna av tjänster och stödfunktioner
* mycket goda kunskaper i LOU och förståelse för hela upphandlingsprocessen
* god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska, i både tal och skrift.


 Meriterande är om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av upphandling inom bygg- och fastighetsområdet.


 Som person är du initiativtagande och lösningsinriktad. Du tar ansvar och driver uppgifter vidare på ett strukturerat och målinriktat sätt. Du visar gott omdöme i dina beslut och prioriteringar och trivs med att samarbeta. Du är öppen, lyhörd och tillmötesgående i din kommunikation. Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid ovan nämnda kompetenser samt engagemang och motivation för tjänsten. Vi tror också att du delar våra värderingar: ansvarstagande, nytänkande, professionalism och helhetsperspektiv.
   

  

**Din ansökan och rekryteringsprocessen**
 Låter det här som något för dig? Varmt välkommen med din ansökan.
   

  

 När du skickar in din ansökan får du svara på ett antal frågor som är avgörande för vårt fortsatta urvalsarbete. Du behöver inte bifoga ett personligt brev. Ansökan ska vara på svenska.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med tillträde snarast efter överenskommelse. Vi ser mångfald som berikande och välkomnar alla sökande.
   

  

 Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.

title: Master Thesis - Development of MATLAB/Python toolbox for Air-borne transfer function
description:
**Introduction:**
 Thesis project at Scania is an excellent way of making contacts for your future working life. Many of our current employees started their career with a thesis project. We are always looking for academic association with students and universities. If you as a student would like to work on an acoustic project other than the one defined in this ad, you are encouraged to contact us as well.
   

  

 Background:
   

  

 The Air-borne Transfer Function (ATF), also referred to as the cab filter, is the cabin interior noise response to external airborne excitation. Mathematically, it is defined as the ratio between the interior cabin sound pressure level and the external acoustic excitation. The external excitation can be characterized in terms of sound pressure, sound power, or volume velocity. At Scania, these measurements have been performed, and the results are stored as MATLAB files. Such data can be utilized to define component targets or to estimate the interior sound pressure level when the source strength is known. However, to ensure accessibility across different teams, a dedicated toolbox and graphical user interface (GUI) are required to facilitate efficient use of this data within Scania.
   

  

 Goal:
   

  

 The goal of this project to develop a MATLAB/Python tool box and a GUI for ATF.
   

  

 Assignment:
   

  

 Acoustic sources on Scania trucks are distributed across various locations, and several evaluation points exist inside the cab. This results in multiple airborne transfer functions. Moreover, the transfer function can be expressed in different forms, such as sound pressure-to-sound pressure, sound power-to-sound pressure, and volume velocity-to-sound pressure. In addition, Scania has cabs and engines of different sizes, which further increases the number of possible combinations. Accordingly, the present task can be divided into the following parts:
   

  

  

* Design a GUI architecture that accommodates all possible combinations.
* Review and understand the available ATF data (no new measurements are required).
* Develop the underlying software code and integrate the ATF into the toolbox.
* Prepare a final presentation and report.


 Education:
   

  

 Masters student with focus on Engineering mechanics, Acoustics or Computer science.
   

  

 Strong background in MATLAB or similar tools would be considered a plus.
   

  

 Number of students: 1
   

  

 Start date: As soon as possible
   

  

 Estimated time needed: 20-25 weeks
   

  

**Contact persons and supervisors:**
 Mohammad Afzal, +46 8553 819 29, mohammad.afzal@scania.com
   

  

**Application:**
 Your application should contain a covering letter, CV and transcripts.
   

  

**A background check might be conducted for this position. We are conducting interviews continuously and may close the recruitment earlier than the date specified.**

title: Postdoctoral fellow in Social-ecological systems and Natural capital
emails: garry.petersson@su.se, st@st.su.se, st@st.su.se, saco@saco.su.se, saco@saco.su.se, sekodirekt@seko.se, sekodirekt@seko.se
description:
**Stockholm Resilience Centre (SRC)** 
 is a research centre for resilience and sustainable development at Stockholm University. The centre promotes scientific understanding of complex, dynamic interactions between humans and nature in the biosphere; educates the next generation of researchers and leaders in sustainable development; and collaborates with change agents who share our vision. The centre is a joint initiative of Stockholm University and the Beijer Institute for Ecological Economics at the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences. In total, SRC has around 160 employees.
   

  

 More information about us, please visit: Stockholm Resilience Centre.
   

  

 This postdoctoral position offers an opportunity to engage in place-based research with global impact. You will be part of a dynamic and interdisciplinary team working in collaboration with Stanford University’s Natural Capital Project (NatCap) on a pioneering research initiative funded by the Marianne and Marcus Wallenberg Foundation and the Mistra-funded research programme Finance to Revive Biodiversity (https://finbio.org/). FinBio aims to ensure that biodiversity and nature-related risks become a key aspect of decision-making in across the financial sector, from regulation to investment decisions.
   

  

 Main responsibilities
   

  

 The successful candidate will conduct research that focuses on developing an open-access, interactive Regime Shift Explorer to map the risk of regime shifts across the world’s ecosystems.
   

  

 You will:
   

  

* Combine existing understanding of regime shifts as captured in the Regime Shift Database with global social and ecological spatial data.
* Contribute to the design and implementation of the interactive web platform, ensuring it provides clear and actionable information on regime shift risks and strategies to build resilience.
* Collaborate closely with SRC researchers and NatCap to link the Regime Shift Explorer to financial decision contexts, such as screening investments for regime shift risks.
* Publish results in leading academic journals and engage with partners and stakeholders to promote the tool’s use for research, policy, and investment.


 This position will be based at the Stockholm Resilience Centre, Stockholm University, with research visits to Stanford’s Natural Capital Project expected. You will work under the supervision of Prof. Garry D. Peterson (SRC), Dr. Megan Meacham (SRC), Dr. Juan Rocha (SRC), and Dr. Tong Wu (Stanford) who have extensive experience with regime shifts, ecosystem services, and connecting ecology and finance.
   

  

 Qualification requirements
   

  

 In order to qualify for a Postdoctoral position, applicants are required to hold a Swedish doctoral degree or an equivalent relevant degree from another country. The degree must have been completed no later than when the employment decision is made.
   

  

 Assessment criteria
   

  

 It is considered an advantage if the doctoral degree or an equivalent degree was completed no more than three years prior to the application deadline. Under special circumstances, an older degree may also be an advantage. Special circumstances refer to sick leave, parental leave, elected positions in trade unions, service in the total defense, or other similar circumstances, as well as clinical attachment or service/assignments relevant to the subject area.
   

  

 In the appointment process special attention will be given to research skills needed for the position. We seek a candidate with the following qualifications:
   

  

* Experience working on empirical analyses of social-ecological systems, experience with ecosystem service assessment and valuation is a merit.
* Skills in geocomputation and programming competence in a scientific programming language such as R, Julia, or Python. Demonstrated experience in data curation and management.
* Willingness to work as part of a transdisciplinary team, and evidence of previous work with researchers from different disciplines.
* Ability to communicate research ideas and results and an interest to engage with stakeholders outside the academic community.
* Excellent written and spoken English skills.


 We are seeking a researcher who has the ability to work in an international, fast-paced environment. We are seeking a researcher who is responsible, responsive, and effective team member.
   

  

**About The Employment**
 The position involves full-time employment for a minimum of two years and a maximum of three years, with the possibility of extension under special circumstances. Start date as per agreement.
   

  

 We offer
   

  

 With us, you will experience the dynamic interaction between higher education and research that makes Stockholm University an exciting and creative environment. You will work in an international environment and get favourable conditions. The university is located in the National City Park with good transport links to the city.
   

  

 Stockholm University strives to be a workplace free from discrimination and with equal opportunities for all.
   

  

 Contact
   

  

 Further information about the position can be obtained from Prof. Garry D. Peterson, phone: +46 8 674 7742, garry.petersson@su.se.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Apply for the position at Stockholm University's recruitment system. Attach a personal letter and CV as well as the attachments requested in the application form. It is the responsibility of the applicant to ensure that the application is complete in accordance with the instructions in the job advertisement, and that it is submitted before the deadline.
   

  

 The instructions for applicants are available at: How to apply for a position.
   

  

 Stockholm University contributes to the development of sustainable democratic society through knowledge, enlightenment and the pursuit of truth.

title: Rekryteringskonsult till Stockholms stad, vikariat
description:
Stockholm – vår huvudstad med miljoner drömmar, förväntningar och ambitioner. Vi jobbar för alla som lever här idag och i framtiden. Nu söker vi dig som vill tänka stort, nytt och annorlunda med oss – för stockholmarna.
   

  

 Är du en rekryterare som trivs med att planera och driva ditt arbete självständigt? Nu söker vi dig som vill ta dig an ett vikariat i ett kunnigt och engagerat rekryteringsteam. Hos oss rekryterar vi till en stor bredd av verksamheter och roller och bidrar till samhällsnytta genom träffsäker och fördomsmedveten rekrytering. Vi är en modern organisation där kvalitet, samarbete och lärande står i fokus.
   

  

**Välkommen till oss**
 Vi på serviceförvaltningen rekrytering stöttar Stockholms stads chefer med att kvalitetssäkra rekryteringar och bidra till en enhetlig och attraktiv bild av Stockholm stad som arbetsgivare. Vårt mål är att varje rekrytering ska vara träffsäker och långsiktigt hållbar, både för chef och kandidat.
   

  

 Idag är vi ett engagerat team på totalt 24 medarbetare och en avdelningschef. Tillsammans erbjuder vi ett professionellt och uppskattat rekryteringsstöd till Stockholm stads chefer. Vi sitter i ljusa och trivsamma lokaler vid Globen.
   

  

 Just nu söker vi en vikarie för en kollega som är föräldraledig. Vi söker dig som kan börja i slutet av januari 2026 och arbeta till slutet av juni.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Hos oss möts du av en välkomnande, öppen och tillåtande kultur där vi gärna delar med oss av vår kunskap och stöttar varandra. Vi tror på samarbete, nyfikenhet och på att ha roligt tillsammans, samtidigt som vi levererar professionellt rekryteringsstöd till stadens chefer.
   

  

 Hos oss får du också flexibel arbetstid samt vinter- och sommararbetstid och möjlighet att delvis arbeta från annan plats än vårt kontor när arbetet så tillåter.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Som rekryteringskonsult hos oss kommer du främst att arbeta i vårens stora volymprojekt inom äldreomsorgen. Tillsammans med erfarna kollegor arbetar du i högt tempo med många intervjuer för att snabbt och effektivt tillsätta ett stort antal tjänster, till exempel sommarvikarier. Du arbetar självständigt med urval, intervjuer och slutbedömning.
   

  

 Du arbetar kompetensbaserat, med fokus på objektivitet och fördomsmedvetenhet. Våra rekryteringsprocesser är i första hand digitala, vilket skapar flexibla och effektiva lösningar för både chefer och kandidater.
   

  

 Kvalitet och utveckling är centralt för oss. Vi följer upp kund- och kandidatnöjdhet och arbetar ständigt med att förbättra våra arbetssätt.
   

  

**En hälsning från din blivande chef Karin Toll Lane**
 Som chef kommer jag ge dig frihet under ansvar och stöd i din roll hos oss. Jag har ett starkt fokus på kundkvalitet och hoppas att mitt engagemang och min energi för vårt uppdrag kommer smitta av sig. Välkommen till oss!
   

  

**Din kompetens och erfarenhet**
 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

* relevant högskoleexamen
* aktuell och minst ett års arbetslivserfarenhet som rekryteringskonsult där du drivit hela rekryteringsprocesser från kravprofil till slutbedömning för kunds räkning
* aktuell erfarenhet av volymrekrytering
* erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt kompetensbaserad metodik
* erfarenhet av stora urval
* god förmåga att uttrycka dig i svenska, både i tal och skrift.


 Det är meriterande om du har
   

  

* erfarenhet av att arbeta med screeningtester i urval.


 Vi söker dig som är trygg att arbeta självständigt och strukturerat, med förmåga till hög grad av flexibilitet och serviceinställning. Du har lätt att anpassa ditt bemötande, skapa förtroende och bygga goda relationer. Du trivs i ett högt arbetstempo, prioriterar effektivt och driver dina rekryteringsuppdrag framgångsrikt. För att lyckas i rollen är du dessutom resultatinriktad och lösningsorienterad.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Vi rekryterar utan det personliga brevet, i denna rekrytering, för att stärka fokus på de kompetenser och erfarenheter som efterfrågas för denna roll. Vid bedömningen av din ansökan kommer vi endast att utgå ifrån ditt CV och ett antal frågor du får besvara i samband med att du söker tjänsten. Vi önskar att du svarar konkret och kortfattat på frågorna, och att det finns en tydlig koppling mellan dina svar och ditt CV.
   

  

 Screeningtester kan komma att användas som stöd i urvalet om vi får många kvalificerade sökande.
   

  

 Denna rekryteringsprocess kommer innehålla arbetspsykologiska tester på slutkandidat.
   

  

 Tillsättning av tjänsten sker förutsatt att erforderliga beslut fattas.
   

  

 Vi ser mångfald som berikande och välkomnar alla sökande.
   

  

 Stockholms stad arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering som syftar till att se till varje persons kompetens och därmed motverka diskriminering.
   

  

 Serviceförvaltningen är en av stadens fackförvaltningar och har i uppdrag att svara för de administrativa uppgifter som är samordnade i staden. Det handlar framförallt om löneadministration, ekonomiadministration, stadsövergripande upphandlingsfrågor, kontaktcenterverksamhet samt interna konsulter som tillhandahåller stöd inom digitalisering, it & telefoni, rekrytering, samt, fastighets- och lokalfrågor. Vi har cirka 400 medarbetare och sitter i Globenområdet. Vår värdegrund sammanfattas i ordet KÖRA som står för: Kompetens - Öppenhet - Respekt - Ansvar.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tidsbegränsad anställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: Heltid | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/6229 | Kontakt: Linda Gustavsson, rekryteringskonsult 08-50811740, Karin Toll Lane, avdelningschef 08-50811700, | Facklig företrädare: Luis Lopez, Vision 08-50827929, Birgitta Naess, Akademikerförbundet SSR 08-50840621 , | Publicerat: 2025-11-03 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-11-17

title: Consumer Collecting Specialist (Vikariat)
description:
**Red Bull Sverige söker dig som brinner för att leda och utveckla andra, har en stark förmåga att kommunicera och tänka strategiskt. Om du har ett stort intresse för ledarskap och marknadsföring samt trivs i en bred och varierande roll, kan du vara den vi letar efter till vårt Brand Marketing-team som Consumer Collecting Specialist (CCS).**
 Som CCS leder du tillsammans med en kollega Red Bulls ambassadörsprogram för att säkerställa att Red Bull marknadsförs och säljs på universitet i Sverige. Du kommer att ha en central roll i att projektleda samplingsdelen av programmet och utrusta ambassadörerna med de verktyg, resurser och kunskaper som krävs för att de ska kunna göra en bra jobb. Du rekryterar, utbildar och coachar ambassadörerna för att säkerställa ett engagerat och kunnigt team. Utöver detta kommer du att vara projektledare för utvalda event och marknadsinitiativ som genomförs i universitetsmiljön.
   

  

 Tillsammans med din kollega utvecklar ni effektiva planer och uppföljning för att leda ett consumer collecting team i världsklass. Ni identifierar ständigt nya möjligheter och skapar event och aktiviteter på och kring universitet och högskolor runt om i Sverige. Med utgångspunkt från en global strategi arbetar ni med teamet för att skapa och implementera en nationell strategi samt en årlig marknads- och säljplan. Målet är att öka Red Bulls synlighet och stärka varumärkesengagemanget.
   

  

**Rollen är ett vikariat som löper fram till och med 30 september 2026.** 
 Önskad start är så snart som möjligt.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag är den 23 november. Då vi kan komma att tillsätta rollen innan dess rekommenderar vi dig att söka så snart som möjligt!
   

  

**De ansvarsområden som vi anförtror dig:**
**LEDARSKAP OCH KOMMUNIKATION**
 Var en förebild och lev Red Bulls värderingar. Ge vägledning, stöd och coaching till ambassadörerna. Förmedla tydliga förväntningar, riktlinjer och mål. Ge regelbunden feedback och uppföljning. Utför regelbundna fältbesök för att identifiera behov. Utbilda, rekrytera och anställ ett mångsidigt team.
   

  

**PROGRAMUTVECKLING**
 Ansvara för projekt och event på campus som innefattar sampling. Genomföra marknadsplanen för campus och främja samarbete mellan avdelningar. Regelbundet besöka ambassadörerna och säkerställa varumärkets ledande position. Följa upp samplingsinitativ och ta fram verktyg anpassade för campus. Forma arbetssätt utifrån globala direktiv, data, trender och lokala insikter. Regelbundet utvärdera och följa upp arbetspass för att förbättra standarder och effektivitet.
   

  

**PROJEKTLEDNING OCH EVENT**
 Leda initiativ och studentevenemang för att engagera konsumenter och stärka varumärkesupplevelsen på campus. Koordinera avdelningsöverskridande projekt och uppföljningar. Planera och genomföra lokala och globala studentprojekt tillsammans med CCS. Implementera 360-kampanjer och anpassa produktlanseringar för campus.
   

  

**ADMINISTRATION**
 Utveckla och distribuera marknadsmaterial för kampanjer och produktlanseringar. Utveckla riktlinjer för sampling, event och onboarding. Ansvara tillsammans med CCS för bilflottans underhåll och bilrelaterade arbetsuppgifter. Hantera reseplanering och logistik inför evenemang och studentrelaterade projekt.
   

  

**Dina tidigare erfarenheter Du kan visa prov på:**
* Kandidatexamen i HR, ekonomi, försäljning, marknadsföring eller liknande.
* Erfarenhet från och tydligt intresse för marknadsföring.
* Erfarenhet av att leda ett team eller individer.
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga.
* Kompetens inom planering, prioritering och projektledning.
* Analytiskt och kreativt tänkande.
* Hands-on and make-it-happen attityd.
* Positiv inställning till tjänsteresor.
* Trivs i en arbetsmiljö med högt tempo.
* Goda PowerPoint och Excel färdigheter.
* Flytande i Svenska och engelska.


 Red Bull Sweden AB är en arbetsgivare som arbetar för lika möjligheter oavsett vem du är. Vi tror starkt på att olikheter och månfald är viktigt för vår fortsatta framgång. Besluten vi tar i våra rekryteringsprocesser baserar vi på dina erfarenheter och färdigheter och vi välkomnar alla ansökningar som representerar vårt samhälle, oavsett ålder, kön, funktionshinder, sexuell läggning, etnicitet, religion.

title: Professor in Metabolomics
emails: bengt.fadeel@ki.se, bengt.fadeel@ki.se, anne.bostrom@ki.se, anne.bostrom@ki.se, anda.gliga@ki.se, anda.gliga@ki.se, bodil.moberg@ki.se, bodil.moberg@ki.se
description:
* with focus on research


**Do you want to contribute to improving human health?**
 Research at the Institute of Environmental Medicine (IMM) is conducted in physiology, toxicology, epidemiology, and occupational and environmental medicine, with a focus on clarifying how environmental and lifestyle factors affect human health. IMM is a national expert body in environmental medicine, and researchers at IMM serve as scientific advisors to government agencies and participate in national and international expert committees. IMM educates students, doctoral students, and professionals in the field of environmental medicine and IMM is responsible for the master's programme in toxicology and the master's programme in work and health at Karolinska Institutet (KI).
   

  

**Description Of The Subject Area**
 Metabolomics is the large-scale study of small molecules or metabolites in cells or tissues aimed at understanding how these respond to internal or external stimuli. The derangement of the metabolome, i.e., the complete set of metabolites in a biological system may give rise to disease, and metabolomics is used to address the impact of environmental factors on human health and for the characterization of the mechanisms that underlie disease. Metabolomics is applied for molecular phenotyping and is key to understanding the exposome, the totality of an individual’s environmental exposures; it can also be used to identify biomarkers of disease, thereby guiding precision medicine.
   

  

**Your mission**
 The position as professor in metabolomics is focused on the development and application of metabolomics. Mass spectrometry is a method that is commonly used for the identification and quantification of metabolites in biological samples to study the impact of internal or external stimuli. You are expected to independently lead research projects in which metabolomics approaches are used to address questions of relevance to environmental medicine, and you will contribute to IMM:s mission as a national expert body in environmental medicine. You will be engaged in the teaching and supervision of students, doctoral candidates, and post doctoral researchers. You will also have managerial and scientific responsibilities for a research infrastructure for metabolomics and lipidomics at KI.
   

  

**Eligibility Requirements**
 To be eligible for an employment as Professor with focus on research the applicant must have demonstrated excellent scientific skills and very good pedagogical skills.
   

  

 For employment as Professor at Karolinska Institutet, the eligibility requirements are stated in the Instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure and these are applied in relation to established profile of employment:
   

  

 See the instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure for Teachers at Karolinska Institutet.
   

  

 It is a requirement that you have completed 10 weeks of courses on teaching in higher education, as indicated in the recommendations of the Association of Swedish Higher Education Institution. If you lack such education at the time of employment, you must undergo such education during the first two years of employment.
   

  

**Assessment criteria**
 The Professorship has a focus on research. The assessment will weight qualifications as follows: scientific skills (3), pedagogical skills (2), leadership and collaboration skills (2).
   

  

 For employment as Professor at Karolinska Institutet, the assessment criteria are stated in the Instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure and these are applied in relation to established profile of employment:
   

  

 See the instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure for Teachers at Karolinska Institutet.
   

  

**It is furthermore meritorious that you have demonstrated**
* Experience and strong knowledge of mass spectrometry-based metabolomics and the implementation of such protocols in environmental medicine research
* Experience of establishing and operating a research infrastructure (core facility) for metabolomics and lipidomics with particular emphasis on mass spectrometry


 After an overall assessment of the expertise and merits of the applicants in relation to the subject area, Karolinska Institutet will determine which of them has the best potential to contribute to a positive development of the activities at KI.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 A creative and inspiring environment with wide-ranging expertise and interests. Karolinska Institutet is one of the world's leading medical universities. Here, we conduct successful medical research and hold the largest range of medical education in Sweden. At KI, you get to meet researchers working with a wide range of specialisms and methods, giving you ample opportunity to exchange knowledge and experience with the various scientific fields within medicine and health. It is the crossover collaborations, which have pushed KI to where it is today, at the forefront of global research. Several of the people you meet in healthcare are educated at KI. A close relationship with the health care providers is important for creating groundbreaking top quality education and research. Karolinska Institutet is also a state university, which entitles you to several benefits through our collective agreement.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Solna
   

  

 Institute of Enviromental medicin, IMM
   

  

 Your career continues here
   

  

**Application**
 Your application must contain the following documents in English: a cover letter as well as a resumé and a qualifications portfolio including a description of your research plan, both presented in accordance with Karolinska Institutet’s template (http://ki.se/qualificationsportfolio). You may change or add to your application at any time up to and including the application deadline date. After the deadline, the process closes, and no amendment or addition can be made to your application.
   

  

 The applications will be reviewed by external reviewers, most often both national and international. For that reason, all the submitted documents should be written in English.
   

  

 The application is to be submitted through the Varbi recruitment system.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**Want to make a difference? Join us and contribute to better health for all!**

title: Professor in occupational and environmental medicine combined with employment as at least specialist physician at Stockholm Health Care Services
emails: anna.bergstrom@ki.se, anna.bergstrom@ki.se, anne.bostrom@ki.se, anne.bostrom@ki.se, anda.gliga@ki.se, anda.gliga@ki.se, bodil.moberg@ki.se, bodil.moberg@ki.se
description:
* with focus on research


**Do you want to contribute to better health for all?**
 The Institute for Environmental Medicine (IMM) conducts research in occupational and environmental medicine, toxicology, epidemiology and physiology with the aim to clarify how environmental and lifestyle factors affect human health. IMM educates students, doctoral students and professionals in, for example, occupational and environmental medicine, and is responsible for the master's programme in work and health and the master's programme in toxicology at Karolinska Institutet. IMM is a national expert body in environmental medicine. Researchers at IMM are scientific advisors to authorities and other decision makers and participate in national and international expert groups.
   

  

**Description Of The Subject Area**
 Occupational and environmental medicine is a field focused on identifying, assessing, and preventing health risks caused by factors in the work environment and the general environment. Risk factors may include, for example, chemical, physical, biological and psychosocial factors. A specialist physician in occupational and environmental medicine investigates and assesses associations between occupational and environmental risks and disease, works preventively, and with a societal perspective.
   

  

**Your mission**
 You will develop and strengthen occupational and environmental medicine research and education at IMM in close collaboration with the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine at Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm. You will conduct and lead research in occupational and environmental medicine and supervise primarily doctoral students and postdocs. You will also contribute to IMM’s role as a national expert body in environmental medicine in accordance with Ordinance (1994:1244) on the Institute of Environmental Medicine. Your duties will include teaching in courses for which IMM is responsible, such as within the master's programme in work and health, the master's programme in toxicology, and the medical programme. The position is combined with a clinical appointment of at least specialist physician at the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine, Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm. The position is distributed as 70 percent at Karolinska Institutet and 30 percent at the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine.
   

  

**Eligibility Requirements**
 To be eligible for an employment as Professor with focus on research the applicant must have demonstrated excellent scientific skills, very good pedagogical skills and clinical skills.
   

  

 For employment as Professor at Karolinska Institutet, the eligibility requirements are stated in the Instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure and these are applied in relation to established profile of employment:
   

  

 See the instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure for Teachers at Karolinska Institutet.
   

  

 It is a requirement that you have completed 10 weeks of courses on teaching in higher education, as indicated in the recommendations of the Association of Swedish Higher Education Institutions. If you lack such education at the time of employment, you must undergo such education during the first two years of employment.
   

  

 The employment will be combined with an employment as a specialist physician, assistant chief physician or chief physician in occupational and environmental medicine at the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine, Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm and therefore you must have a Swedish MD with specialist competence in occupational and environmental medicine (in Swedish: arbets- och miljömedicin or the previous name yrkes- och miljömedicin) as well as fulfill the National Board of Health and Welfare's requirements for practicing medicine in Sweden.
   

  

 Since the employment includes clinical work, you must, besides English, demonstrate proficiency in Swedish, Norwegian or Danish (C1 level according to the common European reference scale, CERS).
   

  

**Assessment criteria**
 The Professorship has a focus on research. The assessment will weight qualifications as follows: scientific skills (3), pedagogical skills (2), leadership and collaboration skills (3), and clinical skills (2).
   

  

 For employment as Professor at Karolinska Institutet, the assessment criteria stated are in the Instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure and these are applied in relation to the established profile of employment:
   

  

 See the instructions regarding the Appointment Procedure for Teachers at Karolinska Institutet.
   

  

**It is furthermore meritorious that you have demonstrated**
* Documented activities in both occupational and environmental medicine regarding research and health risk assessment.


 After an overall assessment of the expertise and merits of the applicants in relation to the subject area, Karolinska Institutet will determine which of them has the best potential to contribute to a positive development of the activities at KI.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 A creative and inspiring environment with wide-ranging expertise and interests. Karolinska Institutet is one of the world's leading medical universities. Here, we conduct successful medical research and hold the largest range of medical education in Sweden. At KI, you get to meet researchers working with a wide range of specialisms and methods, giving you ample opportunity to exchange knowledge and experience with the various scientific fields within medicine and health. It is the crossover collaborations, which have pushed KI to where it is today, at the forefront of global research. Several of the people you meet in healthcare are educated at KI. A close relationship with the health care providers is important for creating groundbreaking top quality education and research. Karolinska Institutet is also a state university, which entitles you to several benefits through our collective agreement.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Solna
   

  

 Institute of Envorimental Medicin, IMM
   

  

 Your career continues here]
   

  

**Application**
 Your application must contain the following documents in English: a cover letter as well as a resumé and a qualifications portfolio including a description of your research plan, both presented in accordance with Karolinska Institutet’s template (http://ki.se/qualificationsportfolio). You may change or add to your application at any time up to and including the application deadline date. After the deadline, the process closes, and no amendment or addition can be made to your application.
   

  

 The applications will be reviewed by external reviewers, most often both national and international. For that reason, all the submitted documents should be written in English.
   

  

 The application is to be submitted through the Varbi recruitment system.
   

  

**For the clinical employment at Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine, Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm**
 The clinical employment at the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine, Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm requires specialist certificate(s) in occupational and environmental medicine (in Swedish: arbets- och miljömedicin or the previous name yrkes- och miljömedicin) to be attached to the application.
   

  

 The level of clinical employment (chief physician, assistant chief physician, specialist physician) is determined by the Centre for Occupational and Environmental Medicine, Stockholm Health Care Services, Region Stockholm before the decision of employment is made.
   

  

**Want to make a difference? Join us and contribute to better health for all!**
