title: Verksjurist
description:
Som verksjurist på vår rättsavdelning erbjuds du ett av Sveriges viktigaste juristjobb i vilket du varje dag kommer att bidra till Sveriges elförsörjning. Vi behöver dig för att lyckas med vårt samhällsviktiga uppdrag att elektrifiera Sverige.
   

  

 Rättsavdelningen tillhör division gemensamma funktioner - en integrerad del av Svenska kraftnät som ska lösa de gemensamma utmaningarna. Gemensamma funktioner stöttar hela organisationen och jobbar dagligen för att förverkliga Svenska kraftnäts gemensamma mål.
   

  

 Gemensamma funktioner består av kommunikation, HR, rättsavdelning, inköp, säkerhet och beredskap, fastighet och hållbarhet.
   

  

 Vi behöver kreativa, innovativa förmågor med olika kompetenser
   

  

 – är du en av dem?
   

  

 Läs mer om vår arbetsplats här: Vår arbetsplats | Svenska kraftnät (svk.se)
   

  

 Ta chansen och sök till en av Sveriges viktigaste och mest spännande arbetsplatser!
   

  

**Om tjänsten**
 Vill du arbeta som verksjurist i en samhällsviktig verksamhet - i en utvecklande miljö med internationell koppling?
   

  

 Svenska kraftnät expanderar kraftigt på grund av en kombination av Sveriges energiomställning och ett kraftigt ökande behov av el vilket i sin tur involverar många marknadsaktörer och även medför en snabbt ökande internationell samverkan inom elsektorn. Vi stärker därför vår verksamhet med en verksjurist med inriktning mot att stötta verket i en rad olika frågor.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
 Arbetet innebär att ge stöd till verksamheten med juridiska bedömningar inom i huvudsak ellagsområdet och den därtill hörande EU regleringen främst inom områdena drift och elmarknad. Arbetet innebär också att stötta verksamheten i rättsliga frågor som uppstår vid genomförandet av olika regleringar t.ex. vid beslut och avtal. Tillsammans med verksamheten ser du över vilka förändringar som kan behöva föreslås i olika författningar och tar fram och ser över mallar samt avtalsvillkor. Du ger stöd vid prövning enligt ellagen och EU förordningar och ditt arbete sker i nära samarbete med verksamheten. För att trivas i rollen är det viktigt att du är nyfiken och intresserad av att sätta dig in i nya frågeställningar.
   

  

 Utöver ellagsreglering kommer du i din roll få jobba brett med ett flertal olika regleringar, däribland, förvaltningsrätt, avtalsrätt och offentlighet och sekretess.
   

  

 Som verksjurist på Svenska kraftnät får du möjlighet att utveckla din förmåga att arbeta i gränssnittet mellan teknik och juridik, med strategiskt rättsliga frågeställningar. Som verksjurist arbetar du självständigt och har ett stort eget ansvar för de rättsliga frågor som du arbetar med. Du arbetar i nära samarbete med verksamheten. För att möta energiomställningen och klara samhällets elektrifiering utvecklas vår verksamhet snabbt. Du behöver ha viljan att hitta lämpliga lösningar även när juridiken är komplex eller svårtolkad.
   

  

 På Rättsavdelningen arbetar ett trettiotal verksjurister uppdelade på tre enheter , med bl.a. internationella frågor, IT-rätt, ellagstiftning, förvaltningsrätt, entreprenadrätt, avtalsrätt, upphandlingsjuridik samt arbetsrätt. Det dagliga arbetet sker i dialog med de delar av verksamheten som arbetar med aktuella frågeställningar och vi strävar efter att ge ett verksamhetsnära rättsligt stöd.
   

  

 Enheten för Systemjuridik arbetar bl. a med internationellt samarbete, drift- och elmarknadsfrågor, anslutningsfrågor och juridik avseende el, både EU-rätt och nationell rätt.
   

  

**Om dig**
**Skallkrav:**
 Utbildning.
   

  

 Du ska ha en svensk juristexamen eller jur.kand.examen.
   

  

 Vidare ska du ha:
   

  

* Minst fem års erfarenhet av rättsligt arbete från myndighet, advokatbyrå, företag eller organisation
* Erfarenhet av avtalsrättsligt arbete
* Erfarenhet av arbete med EU-rätt
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av energibranschen
* Erfarenhet av tillämpning av juridiska regelverk inom ett tekniskt område
* Erfarenhet av arbete i offentlig verksamhet.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 För att trivas i rollen ser vi att du är strukturerad, arbetar enligt en tydlig processsamt organiserar och planerar ditt arbete väl. Vi ser även att du är stabil och hanterar stress på ett konstruktivt sätt.
   

  

 Dessutom ser vi att du är lösningsorienterad och hittar konstruktiva lösningar på uppkomna problem, analytisk samt ser logik och samband i komplex information eller miljö. Självklart är du sist men inte minst samarbetsorienterad, och hittar lösningar genom att prestigelöst fokusera på det gemensamma målet.
   

  

 I denna rekrytering lägger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg.
* Resor kan förekomma i begränsad utsträckning.
* Möjlighet till distansarbete upp till 50%, när arbetet så tillåter.
* Sista ansökningsdag: 24 november 2025.
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning utan provtjänstgöring.
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 För mer information är du välkommen att följande personer;
   

  

 Rekryterande chef, Tess Mercedez Svennebäck, tel.nr. 010-489 23 56.
   

  

 Ansvarig rekryterare, Lennart Jansson, tel.nr 010-350 91 49.
   

  

 Fackliga representanter.
   

  

 Erica Midfjäll, ST, tel. 010-475 87 31
   

  

 Annika Ingeborn, SACO, tel. 010-475 87 72
   

  

 Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se.
   

  

 Jobba här – bli en viktig del av vår energiframtid | Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare i samband med rekrytering, vi har upphandlade avtal som gäller för Svenska kraftnät som statlig myndighet.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. För mer information om säkerhetsprövning Svenska kraftnät arbetar för att främja mångfald och motverka diskriminering och ser gärna sökanden med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter till våra rekryteringar. Lär känna Svenska kraftnät och hur det är att arbeta hos oss: Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät

title: Head of Data Science
company: Who Collaborating Centre For Int Drug Monitoring
description:
Are you a proven leader and experienced manager with data science expertise? We are looking for a new Head of Data Science to join our Research department and lead our talented data scientists and engineers striving to enable safer use of medicines and vaccines for everyone everywhere.
  
  

Interviews will be held on an ongoing basis.
  
  

Since 1978, Uppsala Monitoring Centre (UMC) has been dedicated to developing, supporting, and expanding the field of pharmacovigilance science and practice.
  
  

As a World Health Organization (WHO) Collaborating Centre, we support work around the world to examine the potential adverse effects of medicines and vaccines and contribute to safer, more informed care of patients.
  
  

We are a diverse, international group of pharmacists, physicians, data scientists, system developers, communicators, and many other professionals motivated by a deep belief that the work we do matters.
  
  

About the role
  
  

We are seeking a Head of Data Science to join our Research Department.
  
  

You will report to our Head of Research.
  
  

The Research department's areas of focus and expertise include data-driven discovery for observational medical data, and computational methods to support and enhance human decision-making throughout pharmacovigilance. We work with advanced methods in natural language processing, statistical pattern discovery and machine learning, collaborate internationally, and share our results in Open Access scientific publications. To get the best possible results, we have adopted an agile approach to scientific development, where scientists collaborate closely across disciplines in agile teams, with a common focus and joint responsibilities. We believe that mastery, purpose, and autonomy for individuals and teams are key enablers to achieve scientific excellence.
  
  

What you will do
  
  

* Manage a group of around 10 data scientists and engineers.
* Provide strategic leadership for the data science and engineering function - define and prioritise key processes for model development, deployment, and lifecycle management; ensure effective cross-departmental collaboration with colleagues responsible for digital infrastructure and user-facing applications; and foster ways of working that integrate scientific rigour with practical impact.
* Ensure the right expertise within the Data Science section through strategic competence development and recruitment.
* Work in close partnership with the Head of Pharmacovigilance Science, the Agile Coach, and staff to lead the operations of UMC’s Research department and create the conditions for agile teams to succeed. You will ensure strategic alignment, foster collaboration, and uphold scientific rigour while empowering teams to decide how best to achieve their goals.
* Stay abreast of technological developments within data science and engineering.


Your qualifications
  
  

* A Master’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.


You have
  
  

* Proven leadership abilities, with at least three years’ experience managing teams of data scientists, engineers, or researchers.
* Strong foundation in data analysis and machine learning, with the ability to engage confidently in technical discussions and coach staff (our teams primarily work with Python, R, and SQL), complemented by broad knowledge across the data science field.
* Experience working across organizational boundaries and engaging effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* An ability to communicate effectively in English, which is our working language.


It is an advantage, if you have
  
  

* Worked with cloud platforms, DevOps and MLOps.
* Worked within agile settings and processes.
* Experience of scientific development, evaluation, and dissemination.
* Experience from the biomedical or pharmaceutical sector.
* Experience working with a variety of data sources.
* A PhD or licentiate degree.


Personal profile
  
  

At UMC we believe that scientific excellence flourishes when empowered teams are trusted, supported, and inspired. As Head of Data Science, you share that philosophy - creating clarity and context rather than control, and enabling scientists to take ownership, collaborate openly, and dare to be bold in their ideas and their science. You cultivate an environment where people feel safe to challenge and be challenged, and where mastery, autonomy, and purpose guide how work gets done.
  
  

You are a confident leader and a warm colleague who builds trust and connection across disciplines. You combine strategic vision with the ability to prioritise and deliver results, even amid competing demands. You lead yourself as well as others - showing integrity, resilience, and balance - and you set an example through open communication, active listening, and respect for diverse perspectives.
  
  

Uppsala Monitoring Centre (UMC) is an independent, self-funded, non-profit foundation established in 1978 dedicated to safer use of medicines and vaccines. Through an agreement between the Government of Sweden and the World Health Organization (WHO), UMC operates the Programme for International Drug Monitoring, supporting over 180 member countries and regions in strengthening safety surveillance, and maintains VigiBase, the WHO global database of adverse event reports. In addition, UMC provides international standards and related digital solutions for secure exchange of pharmacovigilance data, including a global medicine and vaccine terminology for identification of medicinal products. With around 200 staff, UMC advances the science of pharmacovigilance and transforms its practice through technological innovation.
  
  

UMC’s working language is English. We normally apply a probationary period to new appointments.
  
  

If you have any questions regarding this position please contact the responsible manager. You will find the contact details at the end of this page.
  
  

UMC follows the collective agreements between the Swedish Agency for Government Employers and Saco-S and ST. Union representatives are Malin Zaar (Saco-S) and Jessica Avasol (ST), +46 (0)18-65 60 60.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Vill du arbeta i en roll där du får stort inflytande över hur kvalitetssäkring och testarbete utvecklas? Trivs du med att kombinera hands-on testning med förbättringsarbete, automation och nära samarbete med utveckling och verksamhet? Då kan det här vara rätt steg för dig.
  
  

**Om rollen:**  

Som Quality Assurance Engineer blir du en viktig del av ett tvärfunktionellt och nordiskt utvecklingsteam. Här arbetar ni tillsammans med att modernisera och vidareutveckla verksamhetens IT-plattformar. Du ansvarar för att säkerställa kvalitet i hela leveransflödet och spelar en central roll i allt från tidiga kravdiskussioner till release och uppföljning.
  
Du kommer att vara drivande i hur testning planeras och genomförs, bidra till ett mer kvalitetsmedvetet arbetssätt och arbeta både praktiskt och strategiskt för att förbättra testmetodik, processer och automation.
  
**Dina ansvarsområden:** Säkerställa kvalitet genom hela utvecklingskedjan
  
Designa och genomföra manuella och automatiserade tester
  
Utveckla och förbättra teststrategier, processer och rutiner
  
Genomföra och förbättra API-testning i exempelvis Postman
  
Arbeta med integrationstestning, SQL och testdata
  
Identifiera och analysera fel, avvikelser och förbättringsbehov
  
Samarbeta nära utvecklare, produktägare och verksamhetsspecialister i Norden
  
Bidra till effektivare releaseflöden och ökad testautomatisering
  
**Vi tror att du har:** Flera års erfarenhet av testarbete inom systemutveckling
  
Erfarenhet av både manuell testning och testautomatisering
  
Erfarenhet av API-testning och verktyg såsom Postman/Swagger
  
Grundläggande kunskaper i SQL och gärna C#/.NET
  
Erfarenhet av automatiseringsramverk som t.ex. Selenium, Cypress eller Playwright
  
**Meriterande om du även har:** Arbetat inom bank/finans eller andra reglerade branscher
  
Erfarenhet av CI/CD och test i pipelines (ex. Azure DevOps eller Jenkins)
  
Intresse för testledning, processutveckling eller kvalitet på organisatorisk nivå
  
**Som person ser vi att du:** Är strukturerad, analytisk och noggrann
  
Trivs med att samarbeta med andra och dela kunskap
  
Tar egna initiativ och driver förbättringsarbete framåt
  
Ser helheten och kan balansera tempo med kvalitet
  
Har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
  
  

**Om CONSULTING it:**  

När du börjar hos oss som konsult på CONSULTING it blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får dessutom kollegor runt om i Sverige! Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stöttar dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver. Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i ditt nästa, nästa och nästa steg. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!

title: SEB Trainee Programme 2026-27: Project Management & Lean Agile Center of Excellence \u007C SEB, Stockholm
description:
**Do you want to challenge, change, and steer our company into the future? Are you ready to make your mark on the finance industry and positively shape the world? Then you will thrive at SEB.**  

At SEB, we believe in fresh thinking, new working methods, and innovation to create a fairer and more sustainable world. Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success, while sustainability and digitalization influence our long-term strategy. With the International Trainee Programme and as an employee, we'll help you develop new skills and take on more responsibility to create a positive impact. **You will become a crucial key player in shaping the future of the bank**.  

Your Trainee position and your team
**Ready to revolutionize how we deliver technology at scale?** Join our team in the department of Project Management & Lean Agile Center of Excellence at SEB Group Technology and help us transform our delivery organization through AI and data-driven insights.  

We're seeking a passionate individual to pioneer AI-powered solutions that will transform our delivery organization. You'll work at the intersection of data science, AI, and agile delivery practices to revolutionize the way we work. **As a trainee in our team, you will**:
* Identify opportunities to automate and enhance our core delivery processes including product development framework, portfolio management, and decision processes
* Aim to build a data-driven delivery culture that maximizes flow, throughput, and value delivery across our entire technology organization

  

Your responsibilities will include:* **Map and implement AI use cases** across our delivery organization, focusing on tools and solutions that empower chief scrum masters, chief product owners, program managers and engineering managers to make better, faster decisions
* **Design and prototype automation solutions** for key delivery processes including our product development framework, Portfolio management, and intake processes
* **Build comprehensive KPI frameworks** that measure and optimize flow efficiency, throughput, cycle time, and value delivery across teams and portfolios
* **Create intelligent dashboards, analytics and advanced simulation capabilities** that provide real-time insights into delivery performance, bottlenecks, delivery prognosis and improvement opportunities
* **Experiment with generative AI** to automate routine tasks like status reporting, risk identification, and dependency mapping
* **Collaborate with delivery leaders** across divisions to understand pain points and co-create solutions that drive meaningful improvements
* **Establish data-driven practices** that help teams make evidence-based decisions and continuously improve their delivery capabilities



Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to, **you will participate in SEB's International Trainee Programme for nine months.** It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and be professionally and personally challenged.  

  

As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on communication and leadership skills, do rotations in other teams across the bank, participate in a business challenge and do an international internship at another SEB site in the world.

Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.  

  

**To thrive in this role and in the International Trainee programme, we believe you have:*** Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work in English – you will need to translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders in this role
* A collaborative mindset with the ability to work across diverse teams
* A strong understanding of machine learning concepts and programming languages (Python, R or similar)
* Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI or similar)
* Passion for process optimization and continuous improvement

  

It is also meritorious if you have:
* Modern development methodologies and software delivery practices
* Knowledge about LLMs and generative AI applications
* An understanding of DevOps metrics and delivery KPIs (lead time, deployment frequency, MTTR, change failure rate)

  

Previous experience (part-time work, life abroad etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but **what matters most is your potential and passion**.  

In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.  

What we offer
* A nine-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the International Trainee and Tech Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* International exposure with opportunities to work at SEB offices in other countries
* A caring, supportive and respectful culture
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior delivery and technology leaders

  


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.  

The application period for the International Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
The International Trainee programme will start on 1st September 2026.  

  

**Our recruitment process**
We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
The recruitment process includes:
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees

  

Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.  

  

SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.  

Find out more about the International Trainee Programme here: International Trainee Programme \u007C SEB **Learn more about working at SEB** on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
https://sebgroup.com/career
https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: SEB Tech Trainee Programme 2026-27: Trading DevOps Specialist \u007C SEB, Stockholm
description:
**Do you want to challenge, change, and steer our company into the future? Are you passionate about technology and ready to make a difference? Then you will thrive at SEB.**  

At SEB, we believe in fresh thinking, new working methods, and innovation to create a fairer and more sustainable world. Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success, while we place a strong emphasis on sustainability and digitalization as we shape the future of SEB.  

  

With the Tech Trainee Programme and as an employee, we'll help you develop new skills and take on more responsibility to create a positive impact. **You will become a crucial key player in shaping the future of the bank.**  

SEB is a full-service investment bank that offers advisory and financing across all products and client segments. We are recognized as one of the leading Nordic banks within investment banking. Within Equities we have a leading market share of institutional flow on Nordic exchanges, and we provide connectivity throughout Europe, North America & Asia.

Your Tech Trainee position and your team
**Would you like to be part of a team of highly skilled people working in a fast-paced environment?** As a Trading DevOps specialist in the Equities Prime Front Arena team at SEB Group Technology, you will strengthen the support and development of the business and the platform.  

  

Within SEB, Prime Front Arena is the strategic system when it comes to Commodities, Equities, Fixed Income and Securities Lending. This role is within the Equities Trading product area.  

  

**As a Trading DevOps specialist in the Equities Prime Front Arena team, you will:*** Work in a high-pace, dynamic and agile environment
* Be part of a dedicated group of people that interact with SEB’s Equites Trading desk and supporting departments on a daily basis.

  

Your main responsibilities will include:* Development, configuration, testing, and maintenance of new and existing functionality
* Providing end user support and having a very close collaboration with the trading desk(s)
* Troubleshooting together with other teams and with external vendors
* Contributing to an improved way of working and a continuous learning culture
* Occasional presence on the Trading floor

  

Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to, **you will participate in SEB's Tech Trainee Programme for six months**. It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and our global tech organization, and be professionally and personally challenged.  

  

As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on tech tracks, gain communication and leadership skills, and participate in a hackathon and a business challenge.

Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.  

  

**To thrive in this role and in the Tech Trainee Programme, we believe you have:*** Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree or a two-year vocational education in IT or tech
* An interest in trading products, preferably Equities
* Strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work both in English and Swedish
* Some experience using Python as a programming language
* A strong willingness to learn, to get things done and to manage to work in a high-paced environment

We also believe you are:* A team player, with a customer-focused attitude
* Independent, take initiative (contributing with ideas and suggested improvements) as well as can take on multiple tasks


It is meritorious if you have:* Knowledge of trading applications, platforms & protocols
* Experience of the FIX protocol and/or Exchange connections.
* Knowledge in SQL & other programming languages.
* GitHub and Jira understanding.
* Worked in an IDE such as PyCharm or Visual Studio Code.
* Worked in an agile and continuous learning culture



Previous experience (part-time work, student projects, labs in IT/Tech etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but **what matters most is your potential and passion**.  

In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
What we offer* A six-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Networking and collaboration opportunities
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the Tech Trainee and International Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.  

The application period for the Tech Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
The Tech Trainee Programme will start on 1st September 2026.

The recruitment process includes:
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site

Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.

title: Development Engineer - Autonomous Logging
description:
Development Engineer - Autonomous Logging


TRATON is a group of strong brands with a shared mission: transforming transportation together to create the future of sustainable transport solutions. Within TRATON, we include MAN, Scania, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International. As part of a global team of industry experts, you get to think bigger, experience more, and reach further. Together, we have the power to transform transportation - Let´s make a difference together. Find out more: www.traton.com  



Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. **Role Summary**
*This role is a part of TRATON Group R&D, located in Södertälje, Sweden.*  


We are seeking a Development Engineer to join our Autonomous Logging team. This role offers a unique opportunity of being at the heart of real-time data collection for our autonomous vehicles, enabling data driven operations for all our customers. **Job Responsibilities**As a Development Engineer, you will, together with the team, enable a critical component of the autonomous system, i.e., develop and maintain software and tools to enable real-time platform data collection and offloading to our data lakehouse.  



Among other things, you will:
* Process, encode, and record high volumes of data from multiple data streams and formats
* Leverage optimal data storage solutions
* Create robust APIs
* Design analytics and their visualization for the data collection solution.
**Who You Are**

We like people that are team players, attentive and humble with the ability to drive the technical development forward. You have technical experience in the areas of software development, computer science, or a relevant related field.
  

  

The requirements for the job are as follows:  

* B.Sc. or M.Sc. or equivalent in computer science, electrical engineering, or a relevant related field
* Knowledge and experience with Python and C++ along with a keen interest in programming
* Knowledge and experience with Linux and industry standard DevOps tools like Gitlab
* Proficient in English, both in writing and in speech
  



Extra meritorious is:  

* Experience with Agile framework and methodology
* Experience with containerizing and packaging software
* Experience with hardware and software integration
* Experience with AWS
  


*We welcome applicants from all backgrounds – your unique experience and perspectives is valuable to us.***This Is Us**

You will work with a diverse group of experts from various cultures and backgrounds. The team is responsible for all onboard data collection for the TRATON group autonomous vehicles. We employ agile methodologies and are deeply committed to innovation and excellence in autonomous transport solutions.  

  

*Within TRATON Group R&D, you are an important part of something bigger. Joining us means gaining access to the ins and outs of the entire transportation industry.***TRATON Offers**

We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, TRATON Group R&D supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
  

  

Benefits include wellness allowance, bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. We also host events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses for an easy commute to Södertälje.**Application**

Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
  

  

Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-11-16. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.  

  

If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
  

Goncalo Collares Pereira, Manager, goncalo.collares.pereira@se.traton.com  

  

**We look forward to your application!**
  

  

*This recruitment process is handled by Scania for TRATON Group R&D*
**Requisition ID:** 22231
**Number of Openings:** 1.0
**Part-time / Full-time:** Full-time
**Permanent / Temporary:** Permanent
**Country/Region:** SE
**Location(s):**Södertälje, SE, 151 38
**Required Travel:** 0-25%
**Workplace:** Hybrid

title: AI Platform Engineer to Handelsbanken
description:
* Application Deadline: Nov. 23, 2025
* Stockholm
* Hybrid
**Job Description**
-------------------

Join Handelsbanken’s Advanced Analytics & AI department as an AI Platform Engineer and help shape the future of Sweden’s most trusted bank. You’ll build and operate modern data, machine learning, and GenAI capabilities that power insights and solutions with real impact for our customers and colleagues.


**Your team**  

We’re on a mission to lead the industry in advanced analytics and AI, delivering smarter products, services, and experiences for our customers. Our cross-functional team, consisting of Data and Platform Engineers and a Product Manager, combines deep technical expertise with a passion for innovation. Together, we design scalable solutions that use statistics, machine learning, and GenAI to solve real business challenges across the bank.


**Your role**  

As an AI Platform Engineer, you’ll develop and maintain our hybrid data platforms and design efficient data and machine learning pipelines that serve as the foundation for our AI initiatives. Our environments span both on-premises and cloud platforms, so you should enjoy hands-on engineering, especially in Linux—bonus points if you prefer working in the terminal.


We believe DevOps and solid software engineering practices are essential to delivering AI in production. You’ll collaborate closely with Data Engineers, ML Engineers, and Data Scientists to ensure our platforms are robust, scalable, and ready for innovation. You’ll also have opportunities to learn from experienced colleagues and grow your expertise in e.g. CI/CD, MLOps, and data pipelines as part of a supportive, knowledge-sharing team.


**Great Place to Work**
-----------------------

* Tjänstepension
* Vinstdelningssystem
* Gruppförsäkring
* Friskvårdsbidrag
* Bidrag vid föräldraledighet
* Banktjänster
* Banking services
* Benefit in connection with parental leave
* Health promotion subsidy
* Group insurance
* Occupational pension
* Profit-sharing scheme
**Skills & Requirements**
-------------------------

**Your profile**  

You have strong software development skills, with knowledge of Python and SQL, and a deep understanding of system design. You hold a university degree in a technical field with strong academic results.


You’ve worked with data pipelines and ideally have experience with containers and Linux. You’re familiar with ML models and test-driven development practices. Since we collaborate across the organisation, strong communication skills are important.


As a person, you have excellent problem-solving skills and enjoy tackling challenges with code. You’re curious and inventive, continuously striving to learn and improve. You stay up to date with the latest developments and continuously explore new technologies and best practices to find the most effective solutions. You share our commitment to being smart, humble, and, above all, collaborative.


**Why join Handelsbanken**

At Handelsbanken, you’ll join a stable, values-driven organisation that invests long-term in people and technology. You’ll have the opportunity to grow your skills and contribute to our AI transformation in an environment that values trust, learning, and sustainable innovation.


**We look forward to receiving your application**

*As part of Handelsbanken’s recruitment process, candidates who progress to the next stage will be asked to complete a logical reasoning and personality test. The final candidate is also required to undergo and successfully pass a background check conducted by an external provider before employment can be offered.*

**Contact details**

**Recruiting manager:** Johan Helldahl, johan.helldahl@handelsbanken.se
  

**Talent Acquisition Partner:** Alva Jonerot, alva.jonerot@handelsbanken.se
  

**Union representative Finansförbundet:** Per Almshult, per.almshult@handelsbanken.se
  

**Union representative Akademikerföreningen:** Bjarne Nilsson, bjarne.nilsson@handelsbanken.se


  
**About the company**
---------------------

You are given great personal responsibility and the possibility to influence your own and the Bank’s future development. Our various perspectives, insights and innovative ideas are the foundation for how we continue to build the Bank for the future. For us, continual progress is everything, and when you evolve, so does the Bank.


Our idea of running a bank is based on trust and respect for the individual. Our values and strong corporate culture are vital to our success and guide us in how we achieve our goals, co-operate, and support each other. Through a strong local presence, a decentralised way of working, and a long-term perspective, we create sustainable relationships that last through all the stages of life. To us at Handelsbanken, everyone is important. We come from different places with different backgrounds, experience and education. Together, we are Handelsbanken.  



  

Mer om Handelsbanken Mer om Handelsbanken


TOM Bildades 1871


TOM En av världens starkaste banker


TOM All verksamhet utgår från kunden


TOM Decentraliserat arbetssätt med tilltro och respekt för individen


TOM Rikstäckande kontorsnät på våra hemmamarknader


TOM Höga hållbarhetsambitioner


TOM I koncernen arbetar drygt 12 000 medarbetare. 44% av alla chefer är kvinnor.


TOM Högre lönsamhet än genomsnittet för jämförbara konkurrenter


TOM Formed in 1871


TOM One of the world’s strongest banks


TOM All business starts with the customer


TOM Decentralised working method based on trust in and respect for the individual


TOM Nationwide branch network in our home markets


TOM High ambitions regarding sustainability


TOM The Group has just over 12,000 employees. 44% of all managers are women


TOM Higher profitability than the average of peer banks


  
Johan Helldahl | Contact Person

-------------------

Join Handelsbanken’s Advanced Analytics & AI department as a Senior AI Platform Engineer and help shape the future of Sweden’s most trusted bank. As a Senior AI Platform Engineer, you’ll be key in developing and maintaining our hybrid data platforms. You’ll use your expertise to design efficient data and machine learning pipelines that serve as the foundation for our AI initiatives. Our environments span both on-premises and cloud platforms, so you should enjoy hands-on engineering, especially in Linux environments — bonus points if you prefer working in the terminal.


We believe DevOps and solid software engineering practices are essential to delivering AI in production, enabling branch offices and business teams to use the insights and models we create. You’ll collaborate closely with Data Engineers, ML Engineers, and Data Scientists to ensure our platforms are robust, scalable, and ready for innovation. If you’re a seasoned engineer who enjoys working end-to-end, from data sourcing and transformation to operationalising models, and want to advance CI/CD and ML pipelines in a complex environment, this is a great opportunity to make a real impact.

You’ve built and maintained data pipelines, ideally using tools such as dbt, Prefect, or Spark, and you’re experienced with containerised development in Linux. Our idea of running a bank is based on trust and respect for the individual. Our values and strong corporate culture are vital to our success and guide us in how we achieve our goals, co-operate, and support each other. Through a strong local presence, a decentralised way of working, and a long-term perspective, we create sustainable relationships that last through all the stages of life. title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Konfigurera och vidareutveckla CI/CD-pipelines i Jenkins
* Skripta och automatisera flöden i Bash, Python eller Go
* Hantera och utveckla lösningar med Ansible och Docker
* Delta i arbetet med att utveckla interna verktyg och webbaserade applikationer
* Dokumentera, felsöka och förbättra byggsystem och processer
* Samarbeta med andra utvecklingsteam i planering och sprintarbete


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Ingenjörsutbildning inom data, IT, elektronik eller motsvarande
* 5+ års erfarenhet av DevOps, byggsystem och automatisering
* Förståelse för CI/CD-flöden och versionshantering
* Erfarenhet av att konfigurera och vidareutveckla CI/CD-pipelines i Jenkins
* Kunskaper i skriptning (Bash, Python eller Go)
* Erfarenhet av Ansible och Docker
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla interna verktyg eller webbaserade applikationer
* Erfarenhet av felsökning, dokumentation och förbättring av byggsystem
* Erfarenhet av arbete i agila team med sprintar och planeringscykler


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 10-11-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

 Your Tech Trainee position and your team
   

  

**Would you like to be part of a team of highly skilled people working in a fast-paced environment?** 
 As a Trading DevOps specialist in the Equities Prime Front Arena team at SEB Group Technology, you will strengthen the support and development of the business and the platform.
   

  

 Within SEB, Prime Front Arena is the strategic system when it comes to Commodities, Equities, Fixed Income and Securities Lending. This role is within the Equities Trading product area.
   

  

**As a Trading DevOps specialist in the Equities Prime Front Arena team, you will:**
* Work in a high-pace, dynamic and agile environment
* Be part of a dedicated group of people that interact with SEB’s Equites Trading desk and supporting departments on a daily basis.


**Your Main Responsibilities Will Include**
* Development, configuration, testing, and maintenance of new and existing functionality
* Providing end user support and having a very close collaboration with the trading desk(s)
* Troubleshooting together with other teams and with external vendors
* Contributing to an improved way of working and a continuous learning culture
* Occasional presence on the Trading floor


 Simultaneously by working in the role you are being recruited to,
 **you will participate in SEB's Tech Trainee Programme for six months** 
 . It will give you the opportunity to develop an extensive network within the bank, gain a deep understanding of the financial industry and our global tech organization, and be professionally and personally challenged.
   

  

 As part of the programme, you can expect to: contribute to meaningful projects, work on tech tracks, gain communication and leadership skills, and participate in a hackathon and a business challenge.
   

  

 Key traits to thrive in this role and programme
   

  

 We’re looking for young talents who are curious, motivated, and ready to question the status quo.
   

  

**To thrive in this role and in the Tech Trainee Programme, we believe you have:**
* Graduated within the past two years, or will graduate before the programme starts on 1st September 2026 – from a relevant academic degree or a two-year vocational education in IT or tech
* An interest in trading products, preferably Equities
* Strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to take ownership
* Great communication skills and to be able to work both in English and Swedish
* Some experience using Python as a programming language
* A strong willingness to learn, to get things done and to manage to work in a high-paced environment


**We Also Believe You Are**
* A team player, with a customer-focused attitude
* Independent, take initiative (contributing with ideas and suggested improvements) as well as can take on multiple tasks


**It Is Meritorious If You Have**
* Knowledge of trading applications, platforms & protocols
* Experience of the FIX protocol and/or Exchange connections.
* Knowledge in SQL & other programming languages.
* GitHub and Jira understanding.
* Worked in an IDE such as PyCharm or Visual Studio Code.
* Worked in an agile and continuous learning culture


 Previous experience (part-time work, student projects, labs in IT/Tech etc.) and involvement during your studies are advantageous but
 **what matters most is your potential and passion** 
 .
   

  

 In our recruitment, SEB behaviours are something we consider when choosing whom to hire. These behaviours include creating value, acting long-term, and building positive relationships.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

* A six-month trainee programme, designed for professional and personal development
* A full-time employment in the role you have been hired for, after completing the programme successfully
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Networking and collaboration opportunities
* A real business challenge to solve with other participants in the Tech Trainee and International Trainee programmes, where you can create value and make a difference for SEB
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Mentorship from senior leaders


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 The application period for the Tech Trainee programme is open until 11th January 2026 23:59 CET.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact career@seb.se, but we will not process applications via e-mail.
   

  

 The Tech Trainee Programme will start on 1st September 2026.
   

  

**Our recruitment process**
 We want to get to know you, and for you to get to know us.
   

  

**The Recruitment Process Includes**
* Psychometric tests
* Interviews – digitally and/or on-site
* A case exercise and presentation
* SEB Day – an event to learn more about SEB and the programme, with insights from former trainees


 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and history of crime. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which is why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Find out more about the Tech Trainee Programme here: Tech Programme | SEB
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens smarta IT-lösningar? Som DevOps Engineer hos Advania får du en central roll i att bygga automatiserade, säkra och effektiva system som skapar hållbara värden för våra kunder. Tillsammans med engagerade kollegor utvecklar du lösningar som gör skillnad — från kod till produktion. Hos oss får du arbeta i en inkluderande miljö där kunskapsdelning och innovation står i fokus.*
 DevOps Engineer på Advania 🚀
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har ett genuint intresse för teknik och som trivs med att arbeta i team där kunskap delas och där utveckling och drift går hand i hand. För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är problemlösande och proaktiv, med en god samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga. Du är också strukturerad, kvalitetsmedveten och ansvarstagande, och du har en naturlig nyfikenhet och vilja att hålla dig uppdaterad på ny teknik.
   

  

 Du kommer bland annat att:
   

  

  

* Designa, implementera och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för automatiserad testning, bygg och distribution.
* Säkerställa drift, övervakning och tillgänglighet av applikationer och infrastruktur i moln- och/eller on-prem-miljöer.
* Arbeta nära utvecklingsteam och systemadministratörer för att optimera samarbetet mellan utveckling och drift.
* Implementera Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med exempelvis Terraform, Bicep eller CloudFormation.
* Delta i säkerhetsgranskningar, logghantering, prestandaoptimering och incidenthantering.
* Administrera och hantera vår interna utvecklingsorganisation i DevOps.
* Medverka i leveranser gällande design och uppsättning av infrastruktur.


 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har ett genuint intresse för teknik och som trivs med att arbeta i team där kunskap delas och där utveckling och drift går hand i hand. För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är problemlösande och proaktiv, med en god samarbets- och kommunikationsförmåga. Du är också strukturerad, kvalitetsmedveten och ansvarstagande, och du har en naturlig nyfikenhet och vilja att hålla dig uppdaterad på ny teknik.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har:
   

  

  

* Fler års arbetslivserfarenhet av DevOps eller systemutveckling/systemadministration i komplexa IT-miljöer.
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD-verktyg (t.ex. GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, Jenkins).
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar (Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud).
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, ARM, Pulumi).
* Erfarenhet i skriptspråk (Bash, PowerShell, Python eller liknande).
* Erfarenhet av versionshantering med Azure DevOps och Git.
* Erfarenhet av övervakning och loggning (t.ex. Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, Datadog).
* Erfarenhet av release management och testautomatisering.


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 👋
   

  

 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
   

  

 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut. Advania samarbetar även med Ljung & Sjöberg för en proaktiv arbetsplats kopplat till alkohol och droger.
   

  

 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
   

  

 Det är du som arbetar nära kunden som vet vad dem behöver och vad som blir den bästa lösningen för just deras unika behov, både i dag och i morgon. Därför tycker vi att det är du som ska fatta besluten. Det är genom att erbjuda säkra, hållbara och kundanpassade lösningar som vi skapar värde för kunderna och samhället i stort.
   

  

 Vi bryr oss om hur våra medarbetare mår – på riktigt. Därför samarbetar Advania med Ljung & Sjöberg för att skapa en trygg, proaktiv arbetsmiljö med stöd kring alkohol-, drog- och beroenderelaterade frågor. Tillsammans bygger vi en hållbar arbetsplats där det är okej att be om hjälp, och där förebyggande arbete gör skillnad – för individen, teamet och företaget.
   

  

 I en miljö präglad av stort kundfokus och frihet under ansvar blir det extra viktigt för oss att bygga starka team bestående av ödmjuka stjärnor. Att arbeta i en inkluderande miljö, med kollegor och kunder som vill utvecklas, ger oss möjligheten att trivas och ha riktigt roligt på jobbet. Vi tror på en platt organisation med agilt arbetssätt och flexibilitet. Detta är det enda sättet för en hållbar framtid.
   

  

 Advania Sverige, ”The tech company with people at heart”, har kontor över hela landet, från Luleå i norr till Malmö i syd. Dagligen hjälper våra 1 700 specialister våra kunder, både inom privat och offentlig sektor, i deras ambitioner och mål att digitalisera sina verksamheter. Genom långsiktiga relationer, ledande teknologier, moderna plattformslösningar och strategiska partnerskap formar vi framtidens IT-landskap. Vårt syfte sträcker sig bortom teknik: att ge människor kraften att skapa hållbara värden.
   

  

 Advaniagruppen levererar tjänster till kunder i Sverige, Norge, Storbritannien, Island, Finland och Danmark inom hållbar och säker digitalisering.

title: Python/ Scala Data Engineer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* Develop robust data models and build data pipelines using dbt and Snowflake.
* Demonstrate strong technical expertise and hands-on experience with cloud-based data engineering and ETL stacks.
* Collaborate effectively with multiple stakeholders, leveraging excellent communication and customer interfacing skills as part of a multi-disciplinary team.
* Perform data process analysis and performance tuning to ensure optimal efficiency and scalability.
* Write high-quality, efficient code with strong proficiency in SQL.
* Possess solid data engineering experience in ETL/ELT processes and data pipeline development.
* Work with DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and GitHub for version control and automation.
* Demonstrate experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Work in alignment with Agile methodologies and contribute to iterative delivery cycles.


 Mandatory Skills
   

* Scala (preferred) / Python / PySpark
* SQL (must-have)


 All the above skills are mandatory.
   

  

 Desired Skills
   

* Experience with Qlik or Power BI for data visualization.
* Knowledge of cloud technologies and services (AWS, Azure, PaaS, SaaS).
* Familiarity with DevOps, CI/CD, and GitHub practices.


 Benefits
   

  

* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Cloud Consultant AWS
description:
**Utveckla din karriär inom Public Cloud hos Orange Business!** 




  





 Är du passionerad kring cloud-transformation och redo att driva innovation för Orange Business kunder? Vi befinner oss i en spännande tillväxtfas, med höga ambitioner för vårt Public Cloud Delivery-team, och vi söker en AWS-konsult som vill växa tillsammans med oss.
 



 I den här rollen får du en central del i att forma våra AWS-erbjudanden, leverera innovativa molnlösningar och bidra till utvecklingen av vårt team, våra kompetenser och vår kultur. Det här är din chans att bli en del av en samarbetsinriktad miljö där dina idéer räknas och där du kan göra verklig skillnad för våra kunder, vårt team och framtiden för public cloud på Orange Business.
 



  





  





**Din roll kan innebära:** 




  





 ✅ Designa och implementera skalbara molnlösningar på AWS
 



 ✅ Leda migrationsprojekt och moderniseringsinitiativ
 



 ✅ Bygga styrningsramverk och landing zones enligt AWS best practices
 



 ✅ Delta i pre-sales och kundworkshops
 



 ✅ Översätta affärskrav till säkra och skalbara AWS-arkitekturer
 



  





  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 




  




* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av arkitektur och implementation i Azure
* Erfarenhet av moderna leveransverktyg och ramverk (CI/CD, DevOps, Agile/Scrum, Git)
* Erfarenhet av Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation, AWS CDK)
* Erfarenhet av containerisering med Docker och Amazon EKS (Elastic Kubernetes Service)
* Erfarenhet av AWS serverless och integrationslösningar såsom AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, Step Functions, Amazon SQS/SNS
* God förståelse för AWS Well-Architected Framework
* Flytande kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska (tal och skrift)



  





  





**För en senior roll tror vi även att du har:** 




  




* Erfarenhet av komplexa migrationsprojekt
* Erfarenhet av att översätta affärskrav till tekniska lösningar
* Kundnära erfarenhet
* Lösningsorienterat mindset med förmåga att tänka kreativt och leverera innovativa lösningar som skapar affärsvärde



  





  





**Vår teamkultur** 




  





 Om du tycker om att arbeta med ny teknik och hålla din kunskap uppdaterad kommer du passa bra hos oss. Vi arbetar i agila team med en no-blame-kultur där vi uppmuntrar innovation och ger våra medarbetare autonomi att fatta beslut. För oss är det viktigt att ständigt förbättras, arbeta proaktivt och automatisera snarare än att repetera uppgifter.
 



 Är du nyfiken på att utvecklas? Vi ser till att våra team alltid ligger steget före genom att ge tid för certifieringar, delta i eller titta på webbinarier, labba självständigt eller helt enkelt diskutera idéer med kollegor.
 



  





  





  





**Varför ska du välja oss?** 




  




* Flexibelt arbetssätt – hybridlösning med modernt och samarbetsinriktat kontor i Stockholm
* Kontinuerliga lärandemöjligheter och certifieringar
* Vi är en människoorienterad organisation och stolta över vår Great Place to Work-certifiering
* En kultur utan skuldbeläggning – du får frihet att innovera
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste molnteknologin
* Ett community av experter – som Digital Natives sätter vi innovation i centrum för vår kompetens
* Läs mer om våra förmåner
 
 här.



  





  





**Om Orange Business:** 




  





 Orange Business är ett ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratörsföretag med kontor i 65 länder världen över och en del av Orange-koncernen.
 



  





 Digital Services, en affärsenhet inom Orange Business, är en nybildad division inom Orange Business. I Europa består affärsområdet av cirka 1500 medarbetare fördelade över 10 länder. Vi är digitala natives med innovation i centrum för vår verksamhet, vilket gör oss till en pålitlig partner nära våra kunder. Vårt gemensamma uppdrag är att hjälpa dem att förnya, driva och leda sin digitala transformation och sina affärsstrategier inom viktiga digitala områden, inklusive Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace samt Data & AI. Som en agil och snabbfotad digital affärspartner erbjuder affärsenheten pålitliga end-to-end-lösningar och produkter som hjälper företag i en rad olika branscher, både inom privat och offentlig sektor, att transformera sin verksamhet, förbättra kundupplevelsen och driva tillväxt.
 



  





 Med vår digitala expertis är vi en strategisk partner till Orange Business mål att vara en ledande nätverks- och digitalintegratör, med vårt team som en viktig tillväxtmotor.
 



  





  





**Rekryteringsprocessen:** 




  





 Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande och strävar efter att hålla intervjuer och samtal allt eftersom vi får in dem.
 



  





 Är du intresserad men känner att du inte uppfyller alla kriterier till 100 %? Vi uppmuntrar dig att söka ändå! Vi tror på styrkan i mångsidiga kompetenser, perspektiv och individers unika kvaliteter. Vi vill att alla ska känna sig fria att vara sig själva – dina unika förmågor kan passa perfekt för vårt team! Din perfekta match kanske är nästa tjänst vi annonserar, så varför inte ligga steget före och söka redan nu?
 



  





 Är du intresserad av att läsa mer om Orange Business? Besök vår
 
 hemsida
 
 eller följ oss på
 
 LinkedIn.

title: Integration Specialist
description:
We are looking for a skilled and motivated Seeburger BIS Platform Developer to join client's team. The primary responsibility of this role is to support the migration from current solution to Seeburger BIS Platform.
 



  





 The ideal candidate will have a strong background and experience in SEEBURGER implementation projects, including: Requirements gathering, Solution design, Development and testing, Deployment and post-go-live support.
 



  





  





 Skills: Proven hands-on experience with the installation, configuration, administration, and troubleshooting of the SEEBURGER Business Integration Suite (BIS) in enterprise environments. Successfully supported customers in establishing secure SFTP connections to SEEBURGER, ensuring compliance with internal and external security policies.
 



  





 Technical Skills:
 



 ● Proficient in implementing and managing a wide range of secure and non-secure protocols critical for B2B and Managed File Transfer (MFT).
 



 ● Experienced in setting up secure communication channels using SSL/TLS, including certificate management and encryption standards to ensure data confidentiality and integrity.
 



 ● Experienced in leveraging the SEEBURGER API to translate integration and communication artifacts into Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
 



 ● Proficient in: XML, XSLT, JSON transformation logic
 



 ● Strong understanding of SEEBURGER API capabilities for exporting operational metrics and performance data to external observability platforms.
 



 ● Expert in using SEEBURGER's built-in monitoring tools.
 



 ● Experience with SEEBURGER installation and deployment on Kubernetes, including container orchestration, scaling, and resource management.
 



 ● Experience in Managing APIs within SEEBURGER environments, including: Kerberos Authentication, Performance Tuning, File Scanning & Payload Validation, Issue Resolution.
 



 ● Proficient in conducting workshops, knowledge-sharing sessions, and hands-on training to upskill teams on SEEBURGER Platform usage, monitoring, and troubleshooting.
 



  





 Soft Skills:
 



 ● Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.
 



 ● Strong communication and collaboration skills.
 



 ● Ability to work independently and as part of an international team.
 



  





 Language; Fluent in English, both oral and written. Swedish is a merit.
 



 Kindly share your CVs to : careers@hybrus.se
 



  





 Note: This is a contract assignment, and does not provide for Work Authorization. Candidates should be authorized to work in Sweden

title: IT Architect - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 For our Stockholm office, we are looking for IT Architects who will collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on local and international client projects! We develop superior IT strategies, concepts, and solutions actively and on site, applying our technical know-how, experience in IT projects, and analytical and conceptual skills.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* have a degree in computer science, (business) informatics, engineering, or a related field
* have approx. two years of relevant experience in IT consulting or software development (part or full time)
* know that modern tools such as machine learning, cyber resilience, DevOps, agile methods, AI, and robotics aren't just buzzwords, but essential to sustainable IT architectures
* have broad technical expertise and interest in technology trends
* feel particularly comfortable in interdisciplinary teams and global contexts and are flexible and willing to travel
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Shape the digital transformation of globally leading companies, ensuring their success by evaluating their capabilities and performing feasibility studies
* Manage small, agile development teams in strategic IT implementation programs, establish modern practices like DevOps and CI/CD, and be in charge of the technical implementation of crucial digital requirements such as cyber resilience
* Analyze, develop, and optimize cutting-edge, customized IT architectures while applying your comprehensive understanding of legacy IT, enterprise solutions, and current market developments and trends such as cloud computing and microservices


 Additional info
   

  

**How You Can Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
**WHO WE ARE** 





 At Trustly, we're building a smarter, faster, and more secure financial future by revolutionizing the world of payments. As a global leader in Open Banking Payments, we are establishing Pay by Bank as the new standard at checkout, providing unparalleled freedom, speed, and ease to millions of consumers and merchants worldwide.
 




  






 Our Ambition: To build the world’s most disruptive payment network and redefine what the payment experience should feel like.
 




  






 Trustly is a global team of innovators, collaborators, and doers.  If you are driven by a strong sense of purpose and thrive in a dynamic, entrepreneurial, and high-growth environment, join us and be part of a team that’s transforming the way the world pays.
 




  





**About the Product & Tech Organisation
 
  






 Our Product & Technology organisation drives the development of Trustly’s products. The cross functional teams collectively work with innovative ideas, development of products and platform and set the vision and strategy for the problem spaces they own. The Product & Tech organisation consists of a bit more than 200 people spread across Stockholm, Lisbon, Örebro, Paris, London and Izmir. 
 




  






 All teams consist of a product manager, an engineering manager, a lead developer and engineers. Some teams also have designers and analytics competence in the team. They all work closely together to enable new products and features within existing products within Europe and to make sure the payment platform runs without interruptions and with high performance.
 




  






 We are now looking to strengthen our engineering capacity within Product & Technology with one more senior position. We operate in an agile culture combined with DevOps, allowing our teams to take on full responsibility from code to on-call.
 




  





**About the Role
 
  






 As an
 
**Engineering Manager
 
 at Trustly, you will play a crucial role in leading and supporting an agile team of talented engineers. Working closely with product managers, lead developers, and other stakeholders, you’ll ensure delivery of high-quality, scalable, and reliable systems while fostering a positive and empowering team culture. This is an excellent opportunity to bridge technical excellence and people management, delivering real impact in the payments industry.
 


  




**What you'll do** 
* **Team Leadership** 
 : Lead, coach, and support a team of engineers, enabling them to perform at their best while fostering a culture of collaboration, ownership, and continuous learning
* **Delivery Excellence** 
 : Drive successful delivery of the team’s commitments, ensuring alignment with domain objectives and product goals
* **Technical Collaboration** 
 : Work hands-on with lead developers and engineers to design, implement, and maintain scalable systems and solutions aligned with Trustly’s technical standards
* **Product Partnership** 
 : Work closely with the product manager to define and prioritise the team’s roadmap, balancing short-term goals with long-term vision
* **Operational Ownership** 
 : Ensure your team’s systems operate reliably in production, with high performance, availability, and maintainability
* **Talent Development** 
 : Recruit, onboard, and mentor engineers, creating an environment where they can grow and thrive
* **Process Improvement** 
 : Advocate for and implement best practices in agile methodologies, DevOps, and engineering processes to continuously improve team effectiveness



  




**Who you are** 
* Proven experience managing engineering teams in agile environments, with a strong focus on team empowerment and delivery
* Hands-on engineering background with expertise in Java and experience in building scalable, robust systems
* Familiarity with modern tech stacks including Kubernetes, Docker, Kafka, and Spring Boot
* Experience working with cloud solutions (preferably AWS), monitoring, and analytics
* Knowledge of service-based architecture and microservices
* Strong ability to balance technical decisions with business needs, ensuring delivery without sacrificing scalability, performance, or reliability
* Committed to fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence
* Passion for DevOps practices and ownership, with a track record of driving improvements in automation and monitoring
* Exceptional communication, problem-solving, and leadership skills
* Fluent in English



  




**At Trustly, you’ll have the opportunity to:** 
* Shape the future of payments as part of a global leader in the industry
* Work with cutting-edge technology and highly skilled colleagues in an agile and collaborative environment
* Take on a role with real impact, where your contributions directly drive the success of your team and Trustly’s mission
* Enjoy a supportive and dynamic culture that encourages growth, innovation, and ownership






  




  


**Our Fantastic Benefits**

 (varies by location)
 




 🌴
 **20 to 30 days of holiday**
